<s> shelley wrote little during this year </s>
<s> the poem entitled the sunset was written in the spring of the year while still residing at bishopsgate </s>
<s> he spent the summer on the shores of the lake of geneva </s>
<s> the hymn to intellectual beauty was conceived during his voyage round the lake with lord byron </s>
<s> he occupied himself during this voyage by reading the nouvelle heloise for the first time </s>
<s> the reading it on the very spot where the scenes are laid added to the interest and he was at once surprised and charmed by the passionate eloquence and earnest enthralling interest that pervade this work </s>
<s> there was something in the character of saint preux in his abnegation of self and in the worship he paid to love that coincided with shelley's own disposition and though differing in many of the views and shocked by others yet the effect of the whole was fascinating and delightful </s>
<s> mont blanc was inspired by view of that mountain and its surrounding peaks and valleys as he lingered on the bridge of arve on his way through the valley of chamouni </s>
<s> shelley makes the following mention of this poem in his publication of the history of six weeks tour and letters from switzerland the poem entitled mont blanc is written by the author of the two letters from chamouni and vevai </s>
<s> it was composed under the immediate impression of the deep and powerful feelings excited by the objects which it attempts to describe and as an undisciplined overflowing of the soul rests its claim to approbation on an attempt to imitate the untamable wildness and inaccessible solemnity from which those feelings sprang this was an eventful year and less time was given to study than usual </s>
<s> in the list of his reading find in greek theocritus the prometheus of aeschylus several of plutarch's lives and the works of lucian </s>
<s> in latin lucretius pliny's letters the annals and germany of tacitus </s>
<s> in french the history of the french revolution by lacretelle </s>
<s> he read for the first time this year montaigne's essays and regarded them ever after as one of the most delightful and instructive books in the world </s>
<s> the list is scanty in english works locke's essay political justice and coleridge's lay sermon form nearly the whole </s>
<s> it was his frequent habit to read aloud to me in the evening in this way we read this year the new testament paradise lost spenser's faery queen and don quixote </s>

<s> shelley </s>
<s> the very illness that oppressed and the aspect of death which had approached so near shelley appear to have kindled to yet keener life the spirit of poetry in his heart </s>
<s> the restless thoughts kept awake by pain clothed themselves in verse </s>
<s> much was composed during this year </s>
<s> the revolt of islam written and printed was great effort rosalind and helen was begun and the fragments and poems can trace to the same period show how full of passion and reflection were his solitary hours </s>
<s> in addition to such poems as have an intelligible aim and shape many stray idea and transitory emotion found imperfect and abrupt expression and then again lost themselves in silence </s>
<s> as he never wandered without book and without implements of writing find many such in his manuscript books that scarcely bear record while some of them broken and vague as they are will appear valuable to those who love shelley's mind and desire to trace its workings </s>
<s> he projected also translating the hymns of homer his version of several of the shorter ones remains as well as that to mercury already published in the posthumous poems </s>
<s> his readings this year were chiefly greek </s>
<s> besides the hymns of homer and the iliad he read the dramas of aeschylus and sophocles the symposium of plato and arrian's historia indica </s>
<s> in latin apuleius alone is named </s>
<s> in english the bible was his constant study he read great portion of it aloud in the evening </s>
<s> among these evening readings find also mentioned the faerie queen and other modern works the production of his contemporaries coleridge wordsworth moore and byron </s>
<s> his life was now spent more in thought than action he had lost the eager spirit which believed it could achieve what it projected for the benefit of mankind </s>
<s> and yet in the converse of daily life shelley was far from being melancholy man </s>
<s> he was eloquent when philosophy or politics or taste were the subjects of conversation </s>
<s> he was playful and indulged in the wild spirit that mocked itself and others not in bitterness but in sport </s>
<s> the author of nightmare abbey seized on some points of his character and some habits of his life when he painted scythrop </s>
<s> he was not addicted to port or madeira but in youth he had read of illuminati and eleutherarchs and believed that he possessed the power of operating an immediate change in the minds of men and the state of society </s>
<s> these wild dreams had faded sorrow and adversity had struck home but he struggled with despondency as he did with physical pain </s>
<s> there are few who remember him sailing paper boats and watching the navigation of his tiny craft with eagerness or repeating with wild energy the ancient mariner and southey's old woman of berkeley but those who do will recollect that it was in such and in the creations of his own fancy when that was most daring and ideal that he sheltered himself from the storms and disappointments the pain and sorrow that beset his life </s>
<s> no words can express the anguish he felt when his elder children were torn from him </s>
<s> in his first resentment against the chancellor on the passing of the decree he had written curse in which there breathes besides haughty indignation all the tenderness of father's love which could imagine and fondly dwell upon its loss and the consequences </s>
<s> at one time while the question was still pending the chancellor had said some words that seemed to intimate that shelley should not be permitted the care of any of his children and for moment he feared that our infant son would be torn from us </s>
<s> he did not hesitate to resolve if such were menaced to abandon country fortune everything and to escape with his child and find some unfinished stanzas addressed to this son whom afterwards we lost at rome written under the idea that we might suddenly be forced to cross the sea so to preserve him </s>
<s> this poem as well as the one previously quoted were not written to exhibit the pangs of distress to the public they were the spontaneous outbursts of man who brooded over his wrongs and woes and was impelled to shed the grace of his genius over the uncontrollable emotions of his heart </s>
<s> ought to observe that the fourth verse of this effusion is introduced in rosalind and helen </s>
<s> when afterwards this child died at rome he wrote propos of the english burying ground in that city this spot is the repository of sacred loss of which the yearnings of parent's heart are now prophetic he is rendered immortal by love as his memory is by death </s>
<s> my beloved child lies buried here </s>
<s> envy death the body far less than the oppressors the minds of those whom they have torn from me </s>

<s> shelley </s>
<s> we often hear of persons disappointed by first visit to italy </s>
<s> this was not shelley's case </s>
<s> the aspect of its nature its sunny sky its majestic storms of the luxuriant vegetation of the country and the noble marble built cities enchanted him </s>
<s> the sight of the works of art was full enjoyment and wonder </s>
<s> he had not studied pictures or statues before he now did so with the eye of taste that referred not to the rules of schools but to those of nature and truth </s>
<s> the first entrance to rome opened to him scene of remains of antique grandeur that far surpassed his expectations and the unspeakable beauty of naples and its environs added to the impression he received of the transcendent and glorious beauty of italy </s>
<s> our winter was spent at naples </s>
<s> here he wrote the fragments of marenghi and the woodman and the nightingale which he afterwards threw aside </s>
<s> at this time shelley suffered greatly in health </s>
<s> he put himself under the care of medical man who promised great things and made him endure severe bodily pain without any good results </s>
<s> constant and poignant physical suffering exhausted him and though he preserved the appearance of cheerfulness and often greatly enjoyed our wanderings in the environs of naples and our excursions on its sunny sea yet many hours were passed when his thoughts shadowed by illness became gloomy and then he escaped to solitude and in verses which he hid from fear of wounding me poured forth morbid but too natural bursts of discontent and sadness </s>
<s> one looks back with unspeakable regret and gnawing remorse to such periods fancying that had one been more alive to the nature of his feelings and more attentive to soothe them such would not have existed </s>
<s> and yet enjoying as he appeared to do every sight or influence of earth or sky it was difficult to imagine that any melancholy he showed was aught but the effect of the constant pain to which he was martyr </s>
<s> we lived in utter solitude </s>
<s> and such is often not the nurse of cheerfulness for then at least with those who have been exposed to adversity the mind broods over its sorrows too intently while the society of the enlightened the witty and the wise enables us to forget ourselves by making us the sharers of the thoughts of others which is portion of the philosophy of happiness </s>
<s> shelley never liked society in numbers it harassed and wearied him but neither did he like loneliness and usually when alone sheltered himself against memory and reflection in book </s>
<s> but with one or two whom he loved he gave way to wild and joyous spirits or in more serious conversation expounded his opinions with vivacity and eloquence </s>
<s> if an argument arose no man ever argued better </s>
<s> he was clear logical and earnest in supporting his own views attentive patient and impartial while listening to those on the adverse side </s>
<s> had not wall of prejudice been raised at this time between him and his countrymen how many would have sought the acquaintance of one whom to know was to love and to revere </s>
<s> how many of the more enlightened of his contemporaries have since regretted that they did not seek him </s>
<s> how very few knew his worth while he lived </s>
<s> and of those few several were withheld by timidity or envy from declaring their sense of it </s>
<s> but no man was ever more enthusiastically loved more looked up to as one superior to his fellows in intellectual endowments and moral worth by the few who knew him well and had sufficient nobleness of soul to appreciate his superiority </s>
<s> his excellence is now acknowledged but even while admitted not duly appreciated </s>
<s> for who except those who were acquainted with him can imagine his unwearied benevolence his generosity his systematic forbearance </s>
<s> and still less is his vast superiority in intellectual attainments sufficiently understood his sagacity his clear understanding his learning his prodigious memory </s>
<s> all these as displayed in conversation were known to few while he lived and are now silent in the tomb ahi orbo mondo ingrato </s>

<s> shelley </s>
<s> shelley loved the people and respected them as often more virtuous as always more suffering and therefore more deserving of sympathy than the great </s>
<s> he believed that clash between the two classes of society was inevitable and he eagerly ranged himself on the people's side </s>
<s> he had an idea of publishing series of poems adapted expressly to commemorate their circumstances and wrongs </s>
<s> he wrote few but in those days of prosecution for libel they could not be printed </s>
<s> they are not among the best of his productions writer being always shackled when he endeavours to write down to the comprehension of those who could not understand or feel highly imaginative style but they show his earnestness and with what heart felt compassion he went home to the direct point of injury that oppression is detestable as being the parent of starvation nakedness and ignorance </s>
<s> besides these outpourings of compassion and indignation he had meant to adorn the cause he loved with loftier poetry of glory and triumph such is the scope of the ode to the assertors of liberty </s>
<s> he sketched also new version of our national anthem as addressed to liberty </s>

<s> we spent the latter part of the year in florence where shelley passed several hours daily in the gallery and made various notes on its ancient works of art </s>
<s> his thoughts were good deal taken up also by the project of steamboat undertaken by friend an engineer to ply between leghorn and marseilles for which he supplied sum of money </s>
<s> this was sort of plan to delight shelley and he was greatly disappointed when it was thrown aside </s>
<s> there was something in florence that disagreed excessively with his health and he suffered far more pain than usual so much so that we left it sooner than we intended and removed to pisa where we had some friends and above all where we could consult the celebrated vacca as to the cause of shelley's sufferings </s>
<s> he like every other medical man could only guess at that and gave little hope of immediate relief he enjoined him to abstain from all physicians and medicine and to leave his complaint to nature </s>
<s> as he had vainly consulted medical men of the highest repute in england he was easily persuaded to adopt this advice </s>
<s> pain and ill health followed him to the end but the residence at pisa agreed with him better than any other and there in consequence we remained </s>
<s> in the spring we spent week or two near leghorn borrowing the house of some friends who were absent on journey to england </s>
<s> it was on beautiful summer evening while wandering among the lanes whose myrtle hedges were the bowers of the fire flies that we heard the carolling of the skylark which inspired one of the most beautiful of his poems </s>
<s> he addressed the letter to mrs gisborne from this house which was hers he had made his study of the workshop of her son who was an engineer </s>
<s> mrs gisborne had been friend of my father in her younger days </s>
<s> she was lady of great accomplishments and charming from her frank and affectionate nature </s>
<s> she had the most intense love of knowledge delicate and trembling sensibility and preserved freshness of mind after life of considerable adversity </s>
<s> as favourite friend of my father we had sought her with eagerness and the most open and cordial friendship was established between us </s>
<s> our stay at the baths of san giuliano was shortened by an accident </s>
<s> at the foot of our garden ran the canal that communicated between the serchio and the arno </s>
<s> the serchio overflowed its banks and breaking its bounds this canal also overflowed all this part of the country is below the level of its rivers and the consequence was that it was speedily flooded </s>
<s> the rising waters filled the square of the baths in the lower part of which our house was situated </s>
<s> the canal overflowed in the garden behind the rising waters on either side at last burst open the doors and meeting in the house rose to the height of six feet </s>
<s> it was picturesque sight at night to see the peasants driving the cattle from the plains below to the hills above the baths </s>
<s> fire was kept up to guide them across the ford and the forms of the men and the animals showed in dark relief against the red glare of the flame which was reflected again in the waters that filled the square </s>
<s> we then removed to pisa and took up our abode there for the winter </s>
<s> the extreme mildness of the climate suited shelley and his solitude was enlivened by an intercourse with several intimate friends </s>
<s> chance cast us strangely enough on this quiet half unpeopled town but its very peace suited shelley </s>
<s> its river the near mountains and not distant sea added to its attractions and were the objects of many delightful excursions </s>
<s> we feared the south of italy and hotter climate on account of our child our former bereavement inspiring us with terror </s>
<s> we seemed to take root here and moved little afterwards often indeed entertaining projects for visiting other parts of italy but still delaying </s>
<s> but for our fears on account of our child believe we should have wandered over the world both being passionately fond of travelling </s>
<s> but human life besides its great unalterable necessities is ruled by thousand lilliputian ties that shackle at the time although it is difficult to account afterwards for their influence over our destiny </s>

<s> shelley </s>
<s> my task becomes inexpressibly painful as the year draws near that which sealed our earthly fate and each poem and each event it records has real or mysterious connection with the fatal catastrophe </s>
<s> feel that am incapable of putting on paper the history of those times </s>
<s> the heart of the man abhorred of the poet who could peep and botanize upon his mother's grave does not appear to me more inexplicably framed than that of one who can dissect and probe past woes and repeat to the public ear the groans drawn from them in the throes of their agony </s>
<s> the year was spent in pisa or at the baths of san giuliano </s>
<s> we were not as our wont had been alone friends had gathered round us </s>
<s> nearly all are dead and when memory recurs to the past she wanders among tombs </s>
<s> the genius with all his blighting errors and mighty powers the companion of shelley's ocean wanderings and the sharer of his fate than whom no man ever existed more gentle generous and fearless and others who found in shelley's society and in his great knowledge and warm sympathy delight instruction and solace have joined him beyond the grave </s>
<s> few survive who have felt life desert since he left it </s>
<s> what misfortune can equal death </s>
<s> change can convert every other into blessing or heal its sting death alone has no cure </s>
<s> it shakes the foundations of the earth on which we tread it destroys its beauty it casts down our shelter it exposes us bare to desolation </s>
<s> when those we love have passed into eternity life is the desert and the solitude in which we are forced to linger but never find comfort more </s>
<s> there is much in the adonais which seems now more applicable to shelley himself than to the young and gifted poet whom he mourned </s>
<s> the poetic view he takes of death and the lofty scorn he displays towards his calumniators are as prophecy on his own destiny when received among immortal names and the poisonous breath of critics has vanished into emptiness before the fame he inherits </s>
<s> shelley's favourite taste was boating when living near the thames or by the lake of geneva much of his life was spent on the water </s>
<s> on the shore of every lake or stream or sea near which he dwelt he had boat moored </s>
<s> he had latterly enjoyed this pleasure again </s>
<s> there are no pleasure boats on the arno and the shallowness of its waters except in winter time when the stream is too turbid and impetuous for boating rendered it difficult to get any skiff light enough to float </s>
<s> shelley however overcame the difficulty he together with friend contrived boat such as the huntsmen carry about with them in the maremma to cross the sluggish but deep streams that intersect the forests boat of laths and pitched canvas </s>
<s> it held three persons and he was often seen on the arno in it to the horror of the italians who remonstrated on the danger and could not understand how anyone could take pleasure in an exercise that risked life </s>
<s> ma va per la vita they exclaimed </s>
<s> little thought how true their words would prove </s>
<s> he once ventured with friend on the glassy sea of calm day down the arno and round the coast to leghorn which by keeping close in shore was very practicable </s>
<s> they returned to pisa by the canal when missing the direct cut they got entangled among weeds and the boat upset wetting was all the harm done except that the intense cold of his drenched clothes made shelley faint </s>
<s> once went down with him to the mouth of the arno where the stream then high and swift met the tideless sea and disturbed its sluggish waters </s>
<s> it was waste and dreary scene the desert sand stretched into point surrounded by waves that broke idly though perpetually around it was scene very similar to lido of which he had said love all waste and solitary places where we taste the pleasure of believing what we see is boundless as we wish our souls to be and such was this wide ocean and this shore more barren than its billows our little boat was of greater use unaccompanied by any danger when we removed to the baths </s>
<s> some friends lived at the village of pugnano four miles off and we went to and fro to see them in our boat by the canal which fed by the serchio was though an artificial full and picturesque stream making its way under verdant banks sheltered by trees that dipped their boughs into the murmuring waters </s>
<s> by day multitudes of ephemera darted to and fro on the surface at night the fireflies came out among the shrubs on the banks the cicale at noon day kept up their hum the aziola cooed in the quiet evening </s>
<s> it was pleasant summer bright in all but shelley's health and inconstant spirits yet he enjoyed himself greatly and became more and more attached to the part of the country were chance appeared to cast us </s>
<s> sometimes he projected taking farm situated on the height of one of the near hills surrounded by chestnut and pine woods and overlooking wide extent of country or settling still farther in the maritime apennines at massa </s>
<s> several of his slighter and unfinished poems were inspired by these scenes and by the companions around us </s>
<s> it is the nature of that poetry however which overflows from the soul oftener to express sorrow and regret than joy for it is when oppressed by the weight of life and away from those he loves that the poet has recourse to the solace of expression in verse </s>
<s> still shelley's passion was the ocean and he wished that our summers instead of being passed among the hills near pisa should be spent on the shores of the sea </s>
<s> it was very difficult to find spot </s>
<s> we shrank from naples from fear that the heats would disagree with percy leghorn had lost its only attraction since our friends who had resided there were returned to england and monte nero being the resort of many english we did not wish to find ourselves in the midst of colony of chance travellers </s>
<s> no one then thought it possible to reside at via reggio which latterly has become summer resort </s>
<s> the low lands and bad air of maremma stretch the whole length of the western shores of the mediterranean till broken by the rocks and hills of spezia </s>
<s> it was vague idea but shelley suggested an excursion to spezia to see whether it would be feasible to spend summer there </s>
<s> the beauty of the bay enchanted him </s>
<s> we saw no house to suit us but the notion took root and many circumstances enchained as by fatality occurred to urge him to execute it </s>
<s> he looked forward this autumn with great pleasure to the prospect of visit from leigh hunt </s>
<s> when shelley visited lord byron at ravenna the latter had suggested his coming out together with the plan of periodical work in which they should all join </s>
<s> shelley saw prospect of good for the fortunes of his friend and pleasure in his society and instantly exerted himself to have the plan executed </s>
<s> he did not intend himself joining in the work partly from pride not wishing to have the air of acquiring readers for his poetry by associating it with the compositions of more popular writers and also because he might feel shackled in the free expression of his opinions if any friends were to be compromised </s>
<s> by those opinions carried even to their outermost extent he wished to live and die as being in his conviction not only true but such as alone would conduce to the moral improvement and happiness of mankind </s>
<s> the sale of the work might meanwhile either really or supposedly be injured by the free expression of his thoughts and this evil he resolved to avoid </s>

<s> with this last year of the life of shelley these notes end </s>
<s> they are not what intended them to be </s>
<s> began with energy and burning desire to impart to the world in worthy language the sense have of the virtues and genius of the beloved and the lost my strength has failed under the task </s>
<s> recurrence to the past full of its own deep and unforgotten joys and sorrows contrasted with succeeding years of painful and solitary struggle has shaken my health </s>
<s> days of great suffering have followed my attempts to write and these again produced weakness and languor that spread their sinister influence over these notes </s>
<s> dislike speaking of myself but cannot help apologizing to the dead and to the public for not having executed in the manner desired the history engaged to give of shelley's writings </s>
<s> at one time feared that the correction of the press might be less exact through my illness but believe that it is nearly free from error </s>
<s> some asterisks occur in few pages as they did in the volume of posthumous poems either because they refer to private concerns or because the original manuscript was left imperfect </s>
<s> did any one see the papers from which drew that volume the wonder would be how any eyes or patience were capable of extracting it from so confused mass interlined and broken into fragments so that the sense could only be deciphered and joined by guesses which might seem rather intuitive than founded on reasoning </s>
<s> yet believe no mistake was made the winter of was passed in pisa if we might call that season winter in which autumn merged into spring after the interval of but few days of bleaker weather </s>
<s> spring sprang up early and with extreme beauty </s>
<s> shelley had conceived the idea of writing tragedy on the subject of charles </s>
<s> it was one that he believed adapted for drama full of intense interest contrasted character and busy passion </s>
<s> he had recommended it long before when he encouraged me to attempt play </s>
<s> whether the subject proved more difficult than he anticipated or whether in fact he could not bend his mind away from the broodings and wanderings of thought divested from human interest which he best loved cannot tell but he proceeded slowly and threw it aside for one of the most mystical of his poems the triumph of life on which he was employed at the last </s>
<s> his passion for boating was fostered at this time by having among our friends several sailors </s>
<s> his favourite companion edward ellerker williams of the th light dragoons had begun his life in the navy and had afterwards entered the army he had spent several years in india and his love for adventure and manly exercises accorded with shelley's taste </s>
<s> it was their favourite plan to build boat such as they could manage themselves and living on the sea coast to enjoy at every hour and season the pleasure they loved best </s>
<s> captain roberts undertook to build the boat at genoa where he was also occupied in building the bolivar for lord byron </s>
<s> ours was to be an open boat on model taken from one of the royal dockyards </s>
<s> have since heard that there was defect in this model and that it was never seaworthy </s>
<s> in the month of february shelley and his friend went to spezia to seek for houses for us </s>
<s> only one was to be found at all suitable however trifle such as not finding house could not stop shelley the one found was to serve for all </s>
<s> it was unfurnished we sent our furniture by sea and with good deal of precipitation arising from his impatience made our removal </s>
<s> we left pisa on the th of april </s>
<s> the bay of spezia is of considerable extent and divided by rocky promontory into larger and smaller one </s>
<s> the town of lerici is situated on the eastern point and in the depth of the smaller bay which bears the name of this town is the village of san terenzo </s>
<s> our house casa magni was close to this village the sea came up to the door steep hill sheltered it behind </s>
<s> the proprietor of the estate on which it was situated was insane he had begun to erect large house at the summit of the hill behind but his malady prevented its being finished and it was falling into ruin </s>
<s> he had and this to the italians had seemed glaring symptom of very decided madness rooted up the olives on the hillside and planted forest trees </s>
<s> these were mostly young but the plantation was more in english taste than ever elsewhere saw in italy some fine walnut and ilex trees intermingled their dark massy foliage and formed groups which still haunt my memory as then they satiated the eye with sense of loveliness </s>
<s> the scene was indeed of unimaginable beauty </s>
<s> the blue extent of waters the almost landlocked bay the near castle of lerici shutting it in to the east and distant porto venere to the west the varied forms of the precipitous rocks that bound in the beach over which there was only winding rugged footpath towards lerici and none on the other side the tideless sea leaving no sands nor shingle formed picture such as one sees in salvator rosa's landscapes only </s>
<s> sometimes the sunshine vanished when the sirocco raged the ponente the wind was called on that shore </s>
<s> the gales and squalls that hailed our first arrival surrounded the bay with foam the howling wind swept round our exposed house and the sea roared unremittingly so that we almost fancied ourselves on board ship </s>
<s> at other times sunshine and calm invested sea and sky and the rich tints of italian heaven bathed the scene in bright and ever varying tints </s>
<s> the natives were wilder than the place </s>
<s> our near neighbours of san terenzo were more like savages than any people ever before lived among </s>
<s> many night they passed on the beach singing or rather howling the women dancing about among the waves that broke at their feet the men leaning against the rocks and joining in their loud wild chorus </s>
<s> we could get no provisions nearer than sarzana at distance of three miles and half off with the torrent of the magra between and even there the supply was very deficient </s>
<s> had we been wrecked on an island of the south seas we could scarcely have felt ourselves farther from civilisation and comfort but where the sun shines the latter becomes an unnecessary luxury and we had enough society among ourselves </s>
<s> yet confess housekeeping became rather toilsome task especially as was suffering in my health and could not exert myself actively </s>
<s> at first the fatal boat had not arrived and was expected with great impatience </s>
<s> on monday th may it came </s>
<s> williams records the long wished for fact in his journal cloudy and threatening weather </s>
<s> </s>
<s> maglian called and after dinner and while walking with him on the terrace we discovered strange sail coming round the point of porto venere which proved at length to be shelley's boat </s>

<s> in short we have now perfect plaything for the summer it was thus that short sighted mortals welcomed death he having disguised his grim form in pleasing mask </s>
<s> the time of the friends was now spent on the sea the weather became fine and our whole party often passed the evenings on the water when the wind promised pleasant sailing </s>
<s> shelley and williams made longer excursions they sailed several times to massa </s>
<s> they had engaged one of the seamen who brought her round boy by name charles vivian and they had not the slightest apprehension of danger </s>
<s> when the weather was unfavourable they employed themselves with alterations in the rigging and by building boat of canvas and reeds as light as possible to have on board the other for the convenience of landing in waters too shallow for the larger vessel </s>
<s> when shelley was on board he had his papers with him and much of the triumph of life was written as he sailed or weltered on that sea which was soon to engulf him </s>
<s> the heats set in in the middle of june the days became excessively hot </s>
<s> but the sea breeze cooled the air at noon and extreme heat always put shelley in spirits </s>
<s> long drought had preceded the heat and prayers for rain were being put up in the churches and processions of relics for the same effect took place in every town </s>
<s> at this time we received letters announcing the arrival of leigh hunt at genoa </s>
<s> shelley was very eager to see him </s>
<s> was confined to my room by severe illness and could not move it was agreed that shelley and williams should go to leghorn in the boat </s>
<s> strange that no fear of danger crossed our minds </s>
<s> living on the sea shore the ocean became as plaything as child may sport with lighted stick till spark inflames forest and spreads destruction over all so did we fearlessly and blindly tamper with danger and make game of the terrors of the ocean </s>
<s> our italian neighbours even trusted themselves as far as massa in the skiff and the running down the line of coast to leghorn gave no more notion of peril than fair weather inland navigation would have done to those who had never seen the sea </s>
<s> once some months before trelawny had raised warning voice as to the difference of our calm bay and the open sea beyond but shelley and his friend with their one sailor boy thought themselves match for the storms of the mediterranean in boat which they looked upon as equal to all it was put to do </s>
<s> on the st of july they left us </s>
<s> if ever shadow of future ill darkened the present hour such was over my mind when they went </s>
<s> during the whole of our stay at lerici an intense presentiment of coming evil brooded over my mind and covered this beautiful place and genial summer with the shadow of coming misery </s>
<s> had vainly struggled with these emotions they seemed accounted for by my illness but at this hour of separation they recurred with renewed violence </s>
<s> did not anticipate danger for them but vague expectation of evil shook me to agony and could scarcely bring myself to let them go </s>
<s> the day was calm and clear and fine breeze rising at twelve they weighed for leghorn </s>
<s> they made the run of about fifty miles in seven hours and half </s>
<s> the bolivar was in port and the regulations of the health office not permitting them to go on shore after sunset they borrowed cushions from the larger vessel and slept on board their boat </s>
<s> they spent week at pisa and leghorn </s>
<s> the want of rain was severely felt in the country </s>
<s> the weather continued sultry and fine </s>
<s> have heard that shelley all this time was in brilliant spirits </s>
<s> not long before talking of presentiment he had said the only one that he ever found infallible was the certain advent of some evil fortune when he felt peculiarly joyous </s>
<s> yet if ever fate whispered of coming disaster such inaudible but not unfelt prognostics hovered around us </s>
<s> the beauty of the place seemed unearthly in its excess the distance we were at from all signs of civilization the sea at our feet its murmurs or its roaring for ever in our ears all these things led the mind to brood over strange thoughts and lifting it from everyday life caused it to be familiar with the unreal </s>
<s> sort of spell surrounded us and each day as the voyagers did not return we grew restless and disquieted and yet strange to say we were not fearful of the most apparent danger </s>
<s> the spell snapped it was all over an interval of agonizing doubt of days passed in miserable journeys to gain tidings of hopes that took firmer root even as they were more baseless was changed to the certainty of the death that eclipsed all happiness for the survivors for evermore </s>
<s> there was something in our fate peculiarly harrowing </s>
<s> the remains of those we lost were cast on shore but by the quarantine laws of the coast we were not permitted to have possession of them the law with respect to everything cast on land by the sea being that such should be burned to prevent the possibility of any remnant bringing the plague into italy and no representation could alter the law </s>
<s> at length through the kind and unwearied exertions of mr dawkins our charge d'affaires at florence we gained permission to receive the ashes after the bodies were consumed </s>
<s> nothing could equal the zeal of trelawny in carrying our wishes into effect </s>
<s> he was indefatigable in his exertions and full of forethought and sagacity in his arrangements </s>
<s> it was fearful task he stood before us at last his hands scorched and blistered by the flames of the funeral pyre and by touching the burnt relics as he placed them in the receptacles prepared for the purpose </s>
<s> and there in compass of that small case was gathered all that remained on earth of him whose genius and virtue were crown of glory to the world whose love had been the source of happiness peace and good to be buried with him </s>
<s> the concluding stanzas of the adonais pointed out where the remains ought to be deposited in addition to which our beloved child lay buried in the cemetery at rome </s>
<s> thither shelley's ashes were conveyed and they rest beneath one of the antique weed grown towers that recur at intervals in the circuit of the massy ancient wall of rome </s>
<s> he selected the hallowed place himself there is the sepulchre oh not of him but of our joy </s>
<s> and gray walls moulder round on which dull time feeds like slow fire upon hoary brand and one keen pyramid with wedge sublime pavilioning the dust of him who planned this refuge for his memory doth stand like flame transformed to marble and beneath field is spread on which newer band have pitched in heaven's smile their camp of death welcoming him we lose with scarce extinguished breath could sorrow for the lost and shuddering anguish at the vacancy left behind be soothed by poetic imaginations there was something in shelley's fate to mitigate pangs which yet alas </s>

<s> the editor came across the unpublished texts included in this volume as early as </s>
<s> perhaps he ought to apologize for delaying their appearance in print </s>
<s> the fact is he has long been afraid of overrating their intrinsic value </s>
<s> but as the great shelley centenary year has come perhaps this little monument of his wife's collaboration may take its modest place among the tributes which will be paid to his memory </s>
<s> for mary shelley's mythological dramas can at least claim to be the proper setting for some of the most beautiful lyrics of the poet which so far have been read in undue isolation </s>
<s> and even as literary sign of those times as an example of that classical renaissance which the romantic period fostered they may not be altogether negligible </s>

<s> the compositions published in mrs shelley's lifetime afford but an inadequate conception of the intense sensibility and mental vigour of this extraordinary woman thus wrote dr </s>
<s> garnett in preface to his relics of shelley </s>
<s> the words of praise may have sounded unexpectedly warm at that date </s>
<s> perhaps the present volume will make the reader more willing to subscribe or less inclined to demur </s>
<s> mary godwin in her younger days certainly possessed fair share of that nimbleness of invention which generally characterizes women of letters </s>
<s> her favourite pastime as child she herself testifies footnote preface to the edition of frankenstein had been to write stories </s>
<s> and dearer pleasure had been to use her own characteristic abstract and elongated way of putting it the following up trains of thought which had for their subject the formation of succession of imaginary incidents </s>
<s> all readers of shelley's life remember how later on as girl of nineteen and two years wife she was present devout but nearly silent listener at the long symposia held by her husband and byron in switzerland june and how the pondering over german horrors and common resolve to perpetrate ghost stories of their own led her to imagine that most unwomanly of all feminine romances frankenstein the paradoxical effort was paradoxically successful and as publishers lists aver to this day frankenstein's monster has turned out to be the hardest lived specimen of the raw head and bloody bones school of romantic tales </s>
<s> so much no doubt to the credit of mary shelley </s>
<s> but more creditable surely is the fact that she was not tempted as monk lewis had been to persevere in those lugubrious themes </s>
<s> although her publishers et pour cause insisted on styling her the author of frankenstein an entirely different vein appears in her later productions </s>
<s> indeed quiet reserve of tone slow sober and sedate bearing are henceforth characteristic of all her literary attitudes </s>
<s> it is almost case of running from one to the other extreme </s>
<s> the force of style which even adverse critics acknowledged in frankenstein was sometimes perilously akin to the most disputable kinds of romantic rant </s>
<s> but in the historical or society novels which followed in the contributions which graced the keepsakes of the thirties and even alas in the various prefaces and commentaries which accompanied the publication of so many poems of shelley his wife succumbed to an increasing habit of almost victorian reticence and dignity </s>
<s> and those later novels and tales though they sold well in their days and were kindly reviewed can hardly boast of any reputation now </s>
<s> most of them are pervaded by brooding spirit of melancholy of the moping rather than the musical sort and consequently rather ineffective as an artistic motive </s>
<s> students of shelley occasionally scan those pages with view to pick some obscure hints and indirections some veiled reminiscences in the stories of the adventures and misfortunes of the last man or lodore </s>
<s> and the books may be good biography at times they are never life </s>
<s> altogether there is curious contrast between the two aspects hitherto revealed of mary shelley's literary activities </s>
<s> it is as if the pulse which had been beating so wildly so frantically in frankenstein had lapsed with valperga and the rest into an increasingly sluggish flow </s>
<s> the following pages may be held to bridge the gap between those two extremes in felicitous way </s>
<s> more purely artistic mood instinct with the serene joy and clear warmth of italian skies combining good deal of youthful buoyancy with sort of quiet and unpretending philosophy is here represented </s>
<s> and it is submitted that the little classical fancies which mrs shelley never ventured to publish are quite as worthy of consideration as her more ambitious prose works </s>
<s> for one thing they give us the longest poetical effort of the writer </s>
<s> the moon of epipsychidion never seems to have been thrilled with the music of the highest spheres </s>

<s> ii </s>
<s> for indeed there is more than personal interest attached to these writings of mrs shelley's </s>
<s> the fact that the same mind which had revelled few years earlier in the fantastical horrors of frankenstein's abortive creation could now dwell on the melancholy fate of proserpine or the humorous disappointment of midas and delight in their subtle poetical or moral symbolism this fact has its significance </s>
<s> it is one of the earliest indications of the revival in the heart of romanticism of the old love of classical myths and classical beauty </s>
<s> the subject is wide one and cannot be adequately dealt with in this place </s>
<s> but few words may not be superfluous for correct historical appreciation of mrs shelley's attempt </s>
<s> how deficient had been the sense of classical beauty in the so called classical age of english literature is trite consideration of criticism </s>
<s> the treatment of mythology is particularly conclusive on this point </s>
<s> throughout the augustan era mythology was approached as mere treasure house of pleasant fancies artificial decorations motives whether sumptuous or meretricious </s>
<s> allusions to jove and venus mercury apollo or bacchus are of course found in every other page of dryden pope prior swift gay and parnell </s>
<s> but no fresh presentation no loving interpretation of the old myths occur anywhere </s>
<s> the immortal stories were then part and parcel of sort of poetical curriculum through which the whole school must be taken by the stern masters tradition and propriety </s>
<s> there is little to be wondered at if this matter of curriculum was treated by the more passive scholars as matter of course and by the sharper and less reverent disciples as matter of fun </s>
<s> indeed if any personality is then evinced in the adaptation of these old world themes it is generally connected with more or less emphatic disparagement or grotesque distortion of their real meaning </s>
<s> when dryden for example makes use of the legend of midas in his wife of bath's tale he makes not midas's minister but his queen tell the mighty secret and thus secures another hit at woman's loquacity </s>
<s> prior's female phaeton is younger sister who jealous of her elder's success thus pleads with her mamma i'll have my earl as well as she or know the reason why </s>
<s> and she wants to flaunt it accordingly </s>
<s> finally fondness prevailed mamma gave way kitty at heart's desire obtained the chariot for day and set the world on fire </s>
<s> pandora in parnell's hesiod or the rise of woman is only shining vengeance </s>
<s> pleasing bosom cheat specious ill sent by the gods upon earth to punish the race of prometheus </s>
<s> the most poetical fables of greece are desecrated by gay into mere miniatures for the decoration of his fan </s>
<s> similar instances abound later on </s>
<s> when armstrong brings in an apostrophe to the naiads it is in the course of poetical essay on the art of preserving health </s>
<s> and again when cowper stirs himself to intone an ode to apollo it is in the same mock heroic vein patron of all those luckless brains that to the wrong side leaning indite much metre with much pains and little or no meaning </s>
<s> even in gray's pindaric gray's treatment of classical themes there is sort of pervading ennui or the forced appreciativeness of gouty disappointed man </s>
<s> the daughter of jove to whom he dedicates his hymns too often is adversity </s>
<s> and classical reminiscences have even with him dull musty tinge which recalls the antiquarian in his cambridge college rooms rather than the visitor to florence and rome </s>
<s> for one thing his allusions are too many and too transitory to appear anything but artistic tricks and verse making tools </s>
<s> the aegean deep and delphi's steep and meander's amber waves and the rosy crowned loves are too cursorily summoned and dismissed to suggest that they have been brought in for their own sweet sakes </s>
<s> it was thus with all the fine quintessences of ancient lore with all the pearl like accretions of the faiths and fancies of the old world they were handled about freely as kind of curious but not so very rare coins which found no currency in the deeper thoughts of our modern humanity and could therefore be used as mere badge of the learning and taste of literary coterie </s>
<s> the very names of the ancient gods and heroes were in fact assuming that abstract anaemic look which common nouns have in everyday language </s>
<s> thus when garrick in his verses upon lady's embroidery mentions arachne it is obvious that he does not expect the reader to think of the daring challenger of minerva's art or the princess of lydia but just of plain spider </s>
<s> and again when falconer in his early monody on the death of the prince of wales expresses rhetorical wish to aid hoarse howling boreas with his sighs that particular son of astraeus whose love for the nymph orithyia was long unsuccessful because he could not sigh is surely far from the poet's mind and to swell the wind or the gale would have served his turn quite as well though less elegantly </s>
<s> even gibbon with all his partiality for whatever was pre or post christian had indeed no better word than elegant for the ancient mythologies of greece and rome and he surely reflected no particularly advanced opinion when he praised and damned in one breath the pleasant and absurd system of paganism footnote essay on the study of literature section no wonder if in his days and for long time after the passionate giants of the ages of fable had dwindled down to the pretty puppets with which the daughters of the gentry had to while away many school hour </s>
<s> but the days of this rhetorical or satirical didactic or perfunctory treatment of classical themes were doomed </s>
<s> it is the glory of romanticism to have opened magic casements not only on the foam of perilous seas in the west but also on the chambers of the east the chambers of the sun that now from ancient melody had ceased </s>
<s> footnote blake poetical sketches romanticism as freshening up of all the sources of life general rejuvenescence of the soul ubiquitous visiting of the spirit of delight and wonder could not confine itself to the fields of mediaeval romance </s>
<s> even the records of the greek and roman thought assumed new beauty the classical sense was let free from its antiquarian trammels and the perennial fanes resounded to the songs of more impassioned worship </s>
<s> the change however took some time </s>
<s> and it must be admitted that in england especially the romantic movement was slow to go back to classical themes </s>
<s> winckelmann and goethe and chenier the last indeed practically all unknown to his contemporaries had long rediscovered antiquity and felt its pulse anew and praised its enduring power when english poetry had little if anything to show in answer to the plaintive invocation of blake to the ancient muses </s>
<s> the first generation of english romantics either shunned the subject altogether or simply echoed blake's isolated lines in isolated passages as regretful and almost as despondent </s>
<s> from persia to paraguay southey could wander and seek after exotic themes his days could be passed among the dead but neither the classic lands nor the classic heroes ever seem to have detained him </s>

<s> sidenote shelley apollo sings the sleepless hours who watch me as lie curtained with star enwoven tapestries from the broad moonlight of the sky fanning the busy dreams from my dim eyes waken me when their mother the grey dawn tells them that dreams that the moon is gone </s>
<s> then arise and climbing heaven's blue dome walk over the mountains the waves leaving my robe upon the ocean foam my footsteps pave the clouds with fire the caves are filled with my bright presence the air leaves the green earth to my embraces bare </s>
<s> the sunbeams are my shafts with which kill deceit that loves the night fears the day all men who do or even imagine ill fly me and from the glory of my ray good minds and open actions take new might until diminished by the reign of night </s>
<s> feed the clouds the rainbows the flowers with their etherial colours the moon's globe and the pure stars in their eternal bowers are cinctured with my power as with robe whatever lamps on earth or heaven may shine are portions of one power which is mine </s>
<s> stand at noon upon the peak of heaven then with unwilling steps wander down into the clouds of the atlantic even for grief that depart they weep frown what look is more delightful than the smile with which soothe them from the western isle am the eye with which the universe beholds itself knows it is divine </s>
<s> all harmony of instrument or verse all prophecy all medecine is mine all light of art or nature to my song victory and praise in its own right belong </s>

<s> introduction </s>
<s> visited naples in the year </s>
<s> on the th of december of that year my companion and crossed the bay to visit the antiquities which are scattered on the shores of baiae </s>
<s> the translucent and shining waters of the calm sea covered fragments of old roman villas which were interlaced by sea weed and received diamond tints from the chequering of the sun beams the blue and pellucid element was such as galatea might have skimmed in her car of mother of pearl or cleopatra more fitly than the nile have chosen as the path of her magic ship </s>
<s> though it was winter the atmosphere seemed more appropriate to early spring and its genial warmth contributed to inspire those sensations of placid delight which are the portion of every traveller as he lingers loath to quit the tranquil bays and radiant promontories of baiae </s>
<s> we visited the so called elysian fields and avernus and wandered through various ruined temples baths and classic spots at length we entered the gloomy cavern of the cumaean sibyl </s>
<s> our lazzeroni bore flaring torches which shone red and almost dusky in the murky subterranean passages whose darkness thirstily surrounding them seemed eager to imbibe more and more of the element of light </s>
<s> we passed by natural archway leading to second gallery and enquired if we could not enter there also </s>
<s> the guides pointed to the reflection of their torches on the water that paved it leaving us to form our own conclusion but adding it was pity for it led to the sibyl's cave </s>
<s> our curiosity and enthusiasm were excited by this circumstance and we insisted upon attempting the passage </s>
<s> as is usually the case in the prosecution of such enterprizes the difficulties decreased on examination </s>
<s> we found on each side of the humid pathway dry land for the sole of the foot at length we arrived at large desert dark cavern which the lazzeroni assured us was the sibyl's cave </s>
<s> we were sufficiently disappointed yet we examined it with care as if its blank rocky walls could still bear trace of celestial visitant </s>
<s> on one side was small opening </s>
<s> whither does this lead </s>
<s> we asked can we enter here questo poi no said the wild looking savage who held the torch you can advance but short distance and nobody visits it nevertheless will try it said my companion it may lead to the real cavern </s>
<s> shall go alone or will you accompany me signified my readiness to proceed but our guides protested against such measure </s>
<s> with great volubility in their native neapolitan dialect with which we were not very familiar they told us that there were spectres that the roof would fall in that it was too narrow to admit us that there was deep hole within filled with water and we might be drowned </s>
<s> my friend shortened the harangue by taking the man's torch from him and we proceeded alone </s>
<s> the passage which at first scarcely admitted us quickly grew narrower and lower we were almost bent double yet still we persisted in making our way through it </s>
<s> at length we entered wider space and the low roof heightened but as we congratulated ourselves on this change our torch was extinguished by current of air and we were left in utter darkness </s>
<s> the guides bring with them materials for renewing the light but we had none our only resource was to return as we came </s>
<s> we groped round the widened space to find the entrance and after time fancied that we had succeeded </s>
<s> this proved however to be second passage which evidently ascended </s>
<s> it terminated like the former though something approaching to ray we could not tell whence shed very doubtful twilight in the space </s>
<s> by degrees our eyes grew somewhat accustomed to this dimness and we perceived that there was no direct passage leading us further but that it was possible to climb one side of the cavern to low arch at top which promised more easy path from whence we now discovered that this light proceeded </s>
<s> with considerable difficulty we scrambled up and came to another passage with still more of illumination and this led to another ascent like the former </s>
<s> after succession of these which our resolution alone permitted us to surmount we arrived at wide cavern with an arched dome like roof </s>
<s> an aperture in the midst let in the light of heaven but this was overgrown with brambles and underwood which acted as veil obscuring the day and giving solemn religious hue to the apartment </s>
<s> it was spacious and nearly circular with raised seat of stone about the size of grecian couch at one end </s>
<s> the only sign that life had been here was the perfect snow white skeleton of goat which had probably not perceived the opening as it grazed on the hill above and had fallen headlong </s>
<s> ages perhaps had elapsed since this catastrophe and the ruin it had made above had been repaired by the growth of vegetation during many hundred summers </s>
<s> the rest of the furniture of the cavern consisted of piles of leaves fragments of bark and white filmy substance resembling the inner part of the green hood which shelters the grain of the unripe indian corn </s>
<s> we were fatigued by our struggles to attain this point and seated ourselves on the rocky couch while the sounds of tinkling sheep bells and shout of shepherd boy reached us from above </s>
<s> at length my friend who had taken up some of the leaves strewed about exclaimed this is the sibyl's cave these are sibylline leaves on examination we found that all the leaves bark and other substances were traced with written characters </s>
<s> what appeared to us more astonishing was that these writings were expressed in various languages some unknown to my companion ancient chaldee and egyptian hieroglyphics old as the pyramids </s>
<s> stranger still some were in modern dialects english and italian </s>
<s> we could make out little by the dim light but they seemed to contain prophecies detailed relations of events but lately passed names now well known but of modern date and often exclamations of exultation or woe of victory or defeat were traced on their thin scant pages </s>
<s> this was certainly the sibyl's cave not indeed exactly as virgil describes it but the whole of this land had been so convulsed by earthquake and volcano that the change was not wonderful though the traces of ruin were effaced by time and we probably owed the preservation of these leaves to the accident which had closed the mouth of the cavern and the swift growing vegetation which had rendered its sole opening impervious to the storm </s>
<s> we made hasty selection of such of the leaves whose writing one at least of us could understand and then laden with our treasure we bade adieu to the dim hypaethric cavern and after much difficulty succeeded in rejoining our guides </s>
<s> during our stay at naples we often returned to this cave sometimes alone skimming the sun lit sea and each time added to our store </s>
<s> since that period whenever the world's circumstance has not imperiously called me away or the temper of my mind impeded such study have been employed in deciphering these sacred remains </s>
<s> their meaning wondrous and eloquent has often repaid my toil soothing me in sorrow and exciting my imagination to daring flights through the immensity of nature and the mind of man </s>
<s> for awhile my labours were not solitary but that time is gone and with the selected and matchless companion of my toils their dearest reward is also lost to me di mie tenere frondi altro lavoro credea mostrarte qual fero pianeta ne nvidio insieme mio nobil tesoro </s>
<s> present the public with my latest discoveries in the slight sibylline pages </s>
<s> scattered and unconnected as they were have been obliged to add links and model the work into consistent form </s>
<s> but the main substance rests on the truths contained in these poetic rhapsodies and the divine intuition which the cumaean damsel obtained from heaven </s>
<s> have often wondered at the subject of her verses and at the english dress of the latin poet </s>
<s> sometimes have thought that obscure and chaotic as they are they owe their present form to me their decipherer </s>

<s> peter's he would put them together in form whose mode would be fashioned by his own peculiar mind and talent </s>
<s> doubtless the leaves of the cumaean sibyl have suffered distortion and diminution of interest and excellence in my hands </s>
<s> my only excuse for thus transforming them is that they were unintelligible in their pristine condition </s>
<s> my labours have cheered long hours of solitude and taken me out of world which has averted its once benignant face from me to one glowing with imagination and power </s>
<s> will my readers ask how could find solace from the narration of misery and woeful change </s>
<s> this is one of the mysteries of our nature which holds full sway over me and from whose influence cannot escape </s>
<s> confess that have not been unmoved by the development of the tale and that have been depressed nay agonized at some parts of the recital which have faithfully transcribed from my materials </s>
<s> yet such is human nature that the excitement of mind was dear to me and that the imagination painter of tempest and earthquake or worse the stormy and ruin fraught passions of man softened my real sorrows and endless regrets by clothing these fictitious ones in that ideality which takes the mortal sting from pain </s>
<s> hardly know whether this apology is necessary </s>
<s> for the merits of my adaptation and translation must decide how far have well bestowed my time and imperfect powers in giving form and substance to the frail and attenuated leaves of the sibyl </s>

<s> am the native of sea surrounded nook cloud enshadowed land which when the surface of the globe with its shoreless ocean and trackless continents presents itself to my mind appears only as an inconsiderable speck in the immense whole and yet when balanced in the scale of mental power far outweighed countries of larger extent and more numerous population </s>
<s> so true it is that man's mind alone was the creator of all that was good or great to man and that nature herself was only his first minister </s>
<s> england seated far north in the turbid sea now visits my dreams in the semblance of vast and well manned ship which mastered the winds and rode proudly over the waves </s>
<s> in my boyish days she was the universe to me </s>
<s> when stood on my native hills and saw plain and mountain stretch out to the utmost limits of my vision speckled by the dwellings of my countrymen and subdued to fertility by their labours the earth's very centre was fixed for me in that spot and the rest of her orb was as fable to have forgotten which would have cost neither my imagination nor understanding an effort </s>
<s> my fortunes have been from the beginning an exemplification of the power that mutability may possess over the varied tenor of man's life </s>
<s> with regard to myself this came almost by inheritance </s>
<s> my father was one of those men on whom nature had bestowed to prodigality the envied gifts of wit and imagination and then left his bark of life to be impelled by these winds without adding reason as the rudder or judgment as the pilot for the voyage </s>
<s> his extraction was obscure but circumstances brought him early into public notice and his small paternal property was soon dissipated in the splendid scene of fashion and luxury in which he was an actor </s>
<s> during the short years of thoughtless youth he was adored by the high bred triflers of the day nor least by the youthful sovereign who escaped from the intrigues of party and the arduous duties of kingly business to find never failing amusement and exhilaration of spirit in his society </s>
<s> my father's impulses never under his own controul perpetually led him into difficulties from which his ingenuity alone could extricate him and the accumulating pile of debts of honour and of trade which would have bent to earth any other was supported by him with light spirit and tameless hilarity while his company was so necessary at the tables and assemblies of the rich that his derelictions were considered venial and he himself received with intoxicating flattery </s>
<s> this kind of popularity like every other is evanescent and the difficulties of every kind with which he had to contend increased in frightful ratio compared with his small means of extricating himself </s>
<s> at such times the king in his enthusiasm for him would come to his relief and then kindly take his friend to task my father gave the best promises for amendment but his social disposition his craving for the usual diet of admiration and more than all the fiend of gambling which fully possessed him made his good resolutions transient his promises vain </s>
<s> with the quick sensibility peculiar to his temperament he perceived his power in the brilliant circle to be on the wane </s>
<s> the king married and the haughty princess of austria who became as queen of england the head of fashion looked with harsh eyes on his defects and with contempt on the affection her royal husband entertained for him </s>
<s> my father felt that his fall was near but so far from profiting by this last calm before the storm to save himself he sought to forget anticipated evil by making still greater sacrifices to the deity of pleasure deceitful and cruel arbiter of his destiny </s>
<s> the king who was man of excellent dispositions but easily led had now become willing disciple of his imperious consort </s>
<s> he was induced to look with extreme disapprobation and at last with distaste on my father's imprudence and follies </s>
<s> it is true that his presence dissipated these clouds his warm hearted frankness brilliant sallies and confiding demeanour were irresistible it was only when at distance while still renewed tales of his errors were poured into his royal friend's ear that he lost his influence </s>
<s> the queen's dextrous management was employed to prolong these absences and gather together accusations </s>
<s> at length the king was brought to see in him source of perpetual disquiet knowing that he should pay for the short lived pleasure of his society by tedious homilies and more painful narrations of excesses the truth of which he could not disprove </s>
<s> the result was that he would make one more attempt to reclaim him and in case of ill success cast him off for ever </s>
<s> such scene must have been one of deepest interest and high wrought passion </s>
<s> powerful king conspicuous for goodness which had heretofore made him meek and now lofty in his admonitions with alternate entreaty and reproof besought his friend to attend to his real interests resolutely to avoid those fascinations which in fact were fast deserting him and to spend his great powers on worthy field in which he his sovereign would be his prop his stay and his pioneer </s>
<s> my father felt this kindness for moment ambitious dreams floated before him and he thought that it would be well to exchange his present pursuits for nobler duties </s>

<s> that very night while yet full of gratitude and good resolves this whole sum and its amount doubled was lost at the gaming table </s>
<s> in his desire to repair his first losses my father risked double stakes and thus incurred debt of honour he was wholly unable to pay </s>

<s> happy thrice happy were the months and weeks and hours of that year </s>
<s> friendship hand in hand with admiration tenderness and respect built bower of delight in my heart late rough as an untrod wild in america as the homeless wind or herbless sea </s>
<s> insatiate thirst for knowledge and boundless affection for adrian combined to keep both my heart and understanding occupied and was consequently happy </s>
<s> what happiness is so true and unclouded as the overflowing and talkative delight of young people </s>

<s> sometimes my lawless mood would return my love of peril my resistance to authority but this was in his absence under the mild sway of his dear eyes was obedient and good as boy of five years old who does his mother's bidding </s>

<s> you must begin life he said you are seventeen and longer delay would render the necessary apprenticeship more and more irksome </s>
<s> he foresaw that his own life would be one of struggle and must partake his labours with him </s>
<s> the better to fit me for this task we must now separate </s>
<s> he found my name good passport to preferment and he had procured for me the situation of private secretary to the ambassador at vienna where should enter on my career under the best auspices </s>

<s> thus promised myself as journied towards my destination with roused and ardent expectation expectation of the fulfilment of all that in boyhood we promise ourselves of power and enjoyment in maturity </s>
<s> methought the time was now arrived when childish occupations laid aside should enter into life </s>
<s> even in the elysian fields virgil describes the souls of the happy as eager to drink of the wave which was to restore them to this mortal coil </s>
<s> the young are seldom in elysium for their desires outstripping possibility leave them as poor as moneyless debtor </s>
<s> we are told by the wisest philosophers of the dangers of the world the deceits of men and the treason of our own hearts but not the less fearlessly does each put off his frail bark from the port spread the sail and strain his oar to attain the multitudinous streams of the sea of life </s>
<s> how few in youth's prime moor their vessels on the golden sands and collect the painted shells that strew them </s>
<s> but all at close of day with riven planks and rent canvas make for shore and are either wrecked ere they reach it or find some wave beaten haven some desart strand whereon to cast themselves and die unmourned </s>
<s> truce to philosophy life is before me and rush into possession </s>
<s> hope glory love and blameless ambition are my guides and my soul knows no dread </s>
<s> what has been though sweet is gone the present is good only because it is about to change and the to come is all my own </s>
<s> do fear that my heart palpitates </s>
<s> high aspirations cause the flow of my blood my eyes seem to penetrate the cloudy midnight of time and to discern within the depths of its darkness the fruition of all my soul desires </s>

<s> all was strange and admirable to the shepherd of cumberland </s>

<s> and is not this in its kind happiness </s>

<s> ask if in the calm of their measured reveries if in the deep meditations which fill their hours they feel the extasy of youthful tyro in the school of pleasure </s>

<s> but must enter into some account of this darling of fame this favourite of the wonder loving world </s>
<s> lord raymond was the sole remnant of noble but impoverished family </s>

<s> he writhed beneath an injury he was unable to revenge and he quitted england with vow not to return till the good time should arrive when she might feel the power of him she now despised </s>

<s> had never before been in the neighbourhood of windsor the fertility and beauty of the country around now struck me with admiration which encreased as approached the antique wood </s>
<s> the ruins of majestic oaks which had grown flourished and decayed during the progress of centuries marked where the limits of the forest once reached while the shattered palings and neglected underwood shewed that this part was deserted for the younger plantations which owed their birth to the beginning of the nineteenth century and now stood in the pride of maturity </s>
<s> perdita's humble dwelling was situated on the skirts of the most ancient portion before it was stretched bishopgate heath which towards the east appeared interminable and was bounded to the west by chapel wood and the grove of virginia water </s>
<s> behind the cottage was shadowed by the venerable fathers of the forest under which the deer came to graze and which for the most part hollow and decayed formed fantastic groups that contrasted with the regular beauty of the younger trees </s>
<s> these the offspring of later period stood erect and seemed ready to advance fearlessly into coming time while those out worn stragglers blasted and broke clung to each other their weak boughs sighing as the wind buffetted them weather beaten crew </s>

<s> flowers the children of the spring adorned her garden and casements in the midst of lowliness there was an air of elegance which spoke the graceful taste of the inmate </s>
<s> with beating heart entered the enclosure as stood at the entrance heard her voice melodious as it had ever been which before saw her assured me of her welfare </s>
<s> moment more and perdita appeared she stood before me in the fresh bloom of youthful womanhood different from and yet the same as the mountain girl had left </s>
<s> her eyes could not be deeper than they were in childhood nor her countenance more expressive but the expression was changed and improved intelligence sat on her brow when she smiled her face was embellished by the softest sensibility and her low modulated voice seemed tuned by love </s>
<s> her person was formed in the most feminine proportions she was not tall but her mountain life had given freedom to her motions so that her light step scarce made her foot fall heard as she tript across the hall to meet me </s>

<s> the pause was but for moment the flood of association and natural feeling which had been checked again rushed in full tide upon our hearts and with tenderest emotion we were swiftly locked in each other's embrace </s>
<s> this burst of passionate feeling over with calmed thoughts we sat together talking of the past and present </s>
<s> alluded to the coldness of her letters but the few minutes we had spent together sufficiently explained the origin of this </s>

<s> was there indeed anarchy in the sublime universe of adrian's thoughts did madness scatter the well appointed legions and was he no longer the lord of his own soul </s>
<s> beloved friend this ill world was no clime for your gentle spirit you delivered up its governance to false humanity which stript it of its leaves ere winter time and laid bare its quivering life to the evil ministration of roughest winds </s>
