<s> veil my eyes in terror of the change and gushing tears bear witness to my sympathy for this unimaginable ruin </s>
<s> in obedience to my request perdita detailed the melancholy circumstances that led to this event </s>
<s> the frank and unsuspicious mind of adrian gifted as it was by every natural grace endowed with transcendant powers of intellect unblemished by the shadow of defect unless his dreadless independence of thought was to be construed into one was devoted even as victim to sacrifice to his love for evadne </s>
<s> he entrusted to her keeping the treasures of his soul his aspirations after excellence and his plans for the improvement of mankind </s>
<s> as manhood dawned upon him his schemes and theories far from being changed by personal and prudential motives acquired new strength from the powers he felt arise within him and his love for evadne became deep rooted as he each day became more certain that the path he pursued was full of difficulty and that he must seek his reward not in the applause or gratitude of his fellow creatures hardly in the success of his plans but in the approbation of his own heart and in her love and sympathy which was to lighten every toil and recompence every sacrifice </s>
<s> in solitude and through many wanderings afar from the haunts of men he matured his views for the reform of the english government and the improvement of the people </s>
<s> it would have been well if he had concealed his sentiments until he had come into possession of the power which would secure their practical development </s>
<s> but he was impatient of the years that must intervene he was frank of heart and fearless </s>
<s> he gave not only brief denial to his mother's schemes but published his intention of using his influence to diminish the power of the aristocracy to effect greater equalization of wealth and privilege and to introduce perfect system of republican government into england </s>
<s> at first his mother treated his theories as the wild ravings of inexperience </s>
<s> but they were so systematically arranged and his arguments so well supported that though still in appearance incredulous she began to fear him </s>
<s> she tried to reason with him and finding him inflexible learned to hate him </s>
<s> strange to say this feeling was infectious </s>
<s> his enthusiasm for good which did not exist his contempt for the sacredness of authority his ardour and imprudence were all at the antipodes of the usual routine of life the worldly feared him the young and inexperienced did not understand the lofty severity of his moral views and disliked him as being different from themselves </s>
<s> evadne entered but coldly into his systems </s>
<s> she thought he did well to assert his own will but she wished that will to have been more intelligible to the multitude </s>
<s> she had none of the spirit of martyr and did not incline to share the shame and defeat of fallen patriot </s>
<s> she was aware of the purity of his motives the generosity of his disposition his true and ardent attachment to her and she entertained great affection for him </s>
<s> he repaid this spirit of kindness with the fondest gratitude and made her the treasure house of all his hopes </s>
<s> at this time lord raymond returned from greece </s>
<s> no two persons could be more opposite than adrian and he </s>
<s> with all the incongruities of his character raymond was emphatically man of the world </s>
<s> his passions were violent as these often obtained the mastery over him he could not always square his conduct to the obvious line of self interest but self gratification at least was the paramount object with him </s>
<s> he looked on the structure of society as but part of the machinery which supported the web on which his life was traced </s>
<s> the earth was spread out as an highway for him the heavens built up as canopy for him </s>
<s> adrian felt that he made part of great whole </s>
<s> he owned affinity not only with mankind but all nature was akin to him the mountains and sky were his friends the winds of heaven and the offspring of earth his playmates while he the focus only of this mighty mirror felt his life mingle with the universe of existence </s>
<s> his soul was sympathy and dedicated to the worship of beauty and excellence </s>
<s> adrian and raymond now came into contact and spirit of aversion rose between them </s>
<s> adrian despised the narrow views of the politician and raymond held in supreme contempt the benevolent visions of the philanthropist </s>
<s> with the coming of raymond was formed the storm that laid waste at one fell blow the gardens of delight and sheltered paths which adrian fancied that he had secured to himself as refuge from defeat and contumely </s>
<s> raymond the deliverer of greece the graceful soldier who bore in his mien tinge of all that peculiar to her native clime evadne cherished as most dear raymond was loved by evadne </s>
<s> overpowered by her new sensations she did not pause to examine them or to regulate her conduct by any sentiments except the tyrannical one which suddenly usurped the empire of her heart </s>
<s> she yielded to its influence and the too natural consequence in mind unattuned to soft emotions was that the attentions of adrian became distasteful to her </s>
<s> she grew capricious her gentle conduct towards him was exchanged for asperity and repulsive coldness </s>
<s> when she perceived the wild or pathetic appeal of his expressive countenance she would relent and for while resume her ancient kindness </s>
<s> but these fluctuations shook to its depths the soul of the sensitive youth he no longer deemed the world subject to him because he possessed evadne's love he felt in every nerve that the dire storms of the mental universe were about to attack his fragile being which quivered at the expectation of its advent </s>
<s> perdita who then resided with evadne saw the torture that adrian endured </s>
<s> she loved him as kind elder brother relation to guide protect and instruct her without the too frequent tyranny of parental authority </s>
<s> she adored his virtues and with mixed contempt and indignation she saw evadne pile drear sorrow on his head for the sake of one who hardly marked her </s>
<s> in his solitary despair adrian would often seek my sister and in covered terms express his misery while fortitude and agony divided the throne of his mind </s>
<s> soon alas </s>
<s> was one to conquer </s>
<s> anger made no part of his emotion </s>
<s> with whom should he be angry </s>
<s> not with raymond who was unconscious of the misery he occasioned not with evadne for her his soul wept tears of blood poor mistaken girl slave not tyrant was she and amidst his own anguish he grieved for her future destiny </s>
<s> once writing of his fell into perdita's hands it was blotted with tears well might any blot it with the like life it began thus is not the thing romance writers describe it going through the measures of dance and after various evolutions arriving at conclusion when the dancers may sit down and repose </s>
<s> while there is life there is action and change </s>
<s> we go on each thought linked to the one which was its parent each act to previous act </s>

<s> truly disappointment is the guardian deity of human life she sits at the threshold of unborn time and marshals the events as they come forth </s>
<s> once my heart sat lightly in my bosom all the beauty of the world was doubly beautiful irradiated by the sun light shed from my own soul </s>

<s> chapter iv </s>
<s> the next day lord raymond called at perdita's cottage on his way to windsor castle </s>
<s> my sister's heightened colour and sparkling eyes half revealed her secret to me </s>
<s> he was perfectly self possessed he accosted us both with courtesy seemed immediately to enter into our feelings and to make one with us </s>
<s> scanned his physiognomy which varied as he spoke yet was beautiful in every change </s>
<s> the usual expression of his eyes was soft though at times he could make them even glare with ferocity his complexion was colourless and every trait spoke predominate self will his smile was pleasing though disdain too often curled his lips lips which to female eyes were the very throne of beauty and love </s>
<s> his voice usually gentle often startled you by sharp discordant note which shewed that his usual low tone was rather the work of study than nature </s>
<s> thus full of contradictions unbending yet haughty gentle yet fierce tender and again neglectful he by some strange art found easy entrance to the admiration and affection of women now caressing and now tyrannizing over them according to his mood but in every change despot </s>
<s> at the present time raymond evidently wished to appear amiable </s>
<s> wit hilarity and deep observation were mingled in his talk rendering every sentence that he uttered as flash of light </s>
<s> he soon conquered my latent distaste endeavoured to watch him and perdita and to keep in mind every thing had heard to his disadvantage </s>

<s> but for one thing he would have been completely triumphant </s>
<s> he alluded to adrian and spoke of him with that disparagement that the worldly wise always attach to enthusiasm </s>

<s> that illness from its peculiarity makes it painful to me beyond words to hear him mentioned unless in terms of respect and affection raymond replied but there was nothing conciliatory in his reply </s>
<s> saw that in his heart he despised those dedicated to any but worldly idols </s>
<s> every man he said dreams about something love honour and pleasure you dream of friendship and devote yourself to maniac well if that be your vocation doubtless you are in the right to follow it some reflection seemed to sting him and the spasm of pain that for moment convulsed his countenance checked my indignation </s>

<s> would could dream </s>
<s> but broad and garish day is the element in which live the dazzling glare of reality inverts the scene for me </s>
<s> even the ghost of friendship has departed and love he broke off nor could guess whether the disdain that curled his lip was directed against the passion or against himself for being its slave </s>
<s> this account may be taken as sample of my intercourse with lord raymond </s>
<s> became intimate with him and each day afforded me occasion to admire more and more his powerful and versatile talents that together with his eloquence which was graceful and witty and his wealth now immense caused him to be feared loved and hated beyond any other man in england </s>
<s> my descent which claimed interest if not respect my former connection with adrian the favour of the ambassador whose secretary had been and now my intimacy with lord raymond gave me easy access to the fashionable and political circles of england </s>
<s> to my inexperience we at first appeared on the eve of civil war each party was violent acrimonious and unyielding </s>
<s> parliament was divided by three factions aristocrats democrats and royalists </s>
<s> after adrian's declared predeliction to the republican form of government the latter party had nearly died away chiefless guideless but when lord raymond came forward as its leader it revived with redoubled force </s>
<s> some were royalists from prejudice and ancient affection and there were many moderately inclined who feared alike the capricious tyranny of the popular party and the unbending despotism of the aristocrats </s>
<s> more than third of the members ranged themselves under raymond and their number was perpetually encreasing </s>
<s> the aristocrats built their hopes on their preponderant wealth and influence the reformers on the force of the nation itself the debates were violent more violent the discourses held by each knot of politicians as they assembled to arrange their measures </s>
<s> opprobrious epithets were bandied about resistance even to the death threatened meetings of the populace disturbed the quiet order of the country except in war how could all this end </s>
<s> even as the destructive flames were ready to break forth saw them shrink back allayed by the absence of the military by the aversion entertained by every one to any violence save that of speech and by the cordial politeness and even friendship of the hostile leaders when they met in private society </s>
<s> was from thousand motives induced to attend minutely to the course of events and watch each turn with intense anxiety </s>
<s> could not but perceive that perdita loved raymond methought also that he regarded the fair daughter of verney with admiration and tenderness </s>
<s> yet knew that he was urging forward his marriage with the presumptive heiress of the earldom of windsor with keen expectation of the advantages that would thence accrue to him </s>
<s> all the ex queen's friends were his friends no week passed that he did not hold consultations with her at windsor </s>
<s> had never seen the sister of adrian </s>
<s> had heard that she was lovely amiable and fascinating </s>
<s> wherefore should see her </s>
<s> there are times when we have an indefinable sentiment of impending change for better or for worse to arise from an event and be it for better or for worse we fear the change and shun the event </s>
<s> for this reason avoided this high born damsel </s>
<s> to me she was everything and nothing her very name mentioned by another made me start and tremble the endless discussion concerning her union with lord raymond was real agony to me </s>
<s> methought that adrian withdrawn from active life and this beauteous idris victim probably to her mother's ambitious schemes ought to come forward to protect her from undue influence guard her from unhappiness and secure to her freedom of choice the right of every human being </s>
<s> yet how was to do this </s>
<s> she herself would disdain my interference </s>
<s> since then must be an object of indifference or contempt to her better far better avoid her nor expose myself before her and the scornful world to the chance of playing the mad game of fond foolish icarus </s>
<s> one day several months after my return to england quitted london to visit my sister </s>
<s> her society was my chief solace and delight and my spirits always rose at the expectation of seeing her </s>
<s> her conversation was full of pointed remark and discernment in her pleasant alcove redolent with sweetest flowers adorned by magnificent casts antique vases and copies of the finest pictures of raphael correggio and claude painted by herself fancied myself in fairy retreat untainted by and inaccessible to the noisy contentions of politicians and the frivolous pursuits of fashion </s>
<s> on this occasion my sister was not alone nor could fail to recognise her companion it was idris the till now unseen object of my mad idolatry </s>

<s> some disorder had surely crept into the course of the elements destroying their benignant influence </s>
<s> the wind prince of air raged through his kingdom lashing the sea into fury and subduing the rebel earth into some sort of obedience </s>
<s> the god sends down his angry plagues from high famine and pestilence in heaps they die </s>

<s> or when the dun clouds thickly veil the sky while exhaustless stores of rain are poured down until the dank earth refusing to imbibe the superabundant moisture it lies in pools on the surface when the torch of day seems like meteor to be quenched who has not seen the cloud stirring north arise the streaked blue appear and soon an opening made in the vapours in the eye of the wind through which the bright azure shines </s>

<s> then mighty art thou wind to be throned above all other vicegerents of nature's power whether thou comest destroying from the east or pregnant with elementary life from the west thee the clouds obey the sun is subservient to thee the shoreless ocean is thy slave </s>
<s> thou sweepest over the earth and oaks the growth of centuries submit to thy viewless axe the snow drift is scattered on the pinnacles of the alps the avalanche thunders down their vallies </s>
<s> thou holdest the keys of the frost and canst first chain and then set free the streams under thy gentle governance the buds and leaves are born they flourish nursed by thee </s>

<s> the details contained in the foregoing pages apparently trivial yet each slightest one weighing like lead in the depressed scale of human afflictions this tedious dwelling on the sorrows of others while my own were only in apprehension this slowly laying bare of my soul's wounds this journal of death this long drawn and tortuous path leading to the ocean of countless tears awakens me again to keen grief </s>
<s> had used this history as an opiate while it described my beloved friends fresh with life and glowing with hope active assistants on the scene was soothed there will be more melancholy pleasure in painting the end of all </s>
<s> but the intermediate steps the climbing the wall raised up between what was and is while still looked back nor saw the concealed desert beyond is labour past my strength </s>
<s> time and experience have placed me on an height from which can comprehend the past as whole and in this way must describe it bringing forward the leading incidents and disposing light and shade so as to form picture in whose very darkness there will be harmony </s>
<s> it would be needless to narrate those disastrous occurrences for which parallel might be found in any slighter visitation of our gigantic calamity </s>
<s> does the reader wish to hear of the pest houses where death is the comforter of the mournful passage of the death cart of the insensibility of the worthless and the anguish of the loving heart of harrowing shrieks and silence dire of the variety of disease desertion famine despair and death </s>
<s> there are many books which can feed the appetite craving for these things let them turn to the accounts of boccaccio de foe and browne </s>
<s> the vast annihilation that has swallowed all things the voiceless solitude of the once busy earth the lonely state of singleness which hems me in has deprived even such details of their stinging reality and mellowing the lurid tints of past anguish with poetic hues am able to escape from the mosaic of circumstance by perceiving and reflecting back the grouping and combined colouring of the past </s>
<s> had returned from london possessed by the idea with the intimate feeling that it was my first duty to secure as well as was able the well being of my family and then to return and take my post beside adrian </s>
<s> the events that immediately followed on my arrival at windsor changed this view of things </s>
<s> the plague was not in london alone it was every where it came on us as ryland had said like thousand packs of wolves howling through the winter night gaunt and fierce </s>
<s> when once disease was introduced into the rural districts its effects appeared more horrible more exigent and more difficult to cure than in towns </s>
<s> there was companionship in suffering there and the neighbours keeping constant watch on each other and inspired by the active benevolence of adrian succour was afforded and the path of destruction smoothed </s>
<s> but in the country among the scattered farm houses in lone cottages in fields and barns tragedies were acted harrowing to the soul unseen unheard unnoticed </s>
<s> medical aid was less easily procured food was more difficult to obtain and human beings unwithheld by shame for they were unbeheld of their fellows ventured on deeds of greater wickedness or gave way more readily to their abject fears </s>
<s> deeds of heroism also occurred whose very mention swells the heart and brings tears into the eyes </s>
<s> such is human nature that beauty and deformity are often closely linked </s>
<s> in reading history we are chiefly struck by the generosity and self devotion that follow close on the heels of crime veiling with supernal flowers the stain of blood </s>
<s> such acts were not wanting to adorn the grim train that waited on the progress of the plague </s>
<s> the inhabitants of berkshire and bucks had been long aware that the plague was in london in liverpool bristol manchester york in short in all the more populous towns of england </s>
<s> they were not however the less astonished and dismayed when it appeared among themselves </s>
<s> they were impatient and angry in the midst of terror </s>
<s> they would do something to throw off the clinging evil and while in action they fancied that remedy was applied </s>
<s> the inhabitants of the smaller towns left their houses pitched tents in the fields wandering separate from each other careless of hunger or the sky's inclemency while they imagined that they avoided the death dealing disease </s>
<s> the farmers and cottagers on the contrary struck with the fear of solitude and madly desirous of medical assistance flocked into the towns </s>
<s> but winter was coming and with winter hope </s>
<s> in august the plague had appeared in the country of england and during september it made its ravages </s>
<s> towards the end of october it dwindled away and was in some degree replaced by typhus of hardly less virulence </s>
<s> the autumn was warm and rainy the infirm and sickly died off happier they many young people flushed with health and prosperity made pale by wasting malady became the inhabitants of the grave </s>
<s> the crop had failed the bad corn and want of foreign wines added vigour to disease </s>
<s> before christmas half england was under water </s>
<s> the storms of the last winter were renewed but the diminished shipping of this year caused us to feel less the tempests of the sea </s>
<s> the flood and storms did more harm to continental europe than to us giving as it were the last blow to the calamities which destroyed it </s>
<s> in italy the rivers were unwatched by the diminished peasantry and like wild beasts from their lair when the hunters and dogs are afar did tiber arno and po rush upon and destroy the fertility of the plains </s>
<s> whole villages were carried away </s>
<s> rome and florence and pisa were overflowed and their marble palaces late mirrored in tranquil streams had their foundations shaken by their winter gifted power </s>
<s> in germany and russia the injury was still more momentous </s>
<s> but frost would come at last and with it renewal of our lease of earth </s>
<s> frost would blunt the arrows of pestilence and enchain the furious elements and the land would in spring throw off her garment of snow released from her menace of destruction </s>
<s> it was not until february that the desired signs of winter appeared </s>
<s> for three days the snow fell ice stopped the current of the rivers and the birds flew out from crackling branches of the frost whitened trees </s>
<s> on the fourth morning all vanished </s>
<s> south west wind brought up rain the sun came out and mocking the usual laws of nature seemed even at this early season to burn with solsticial force </s>
<s> it was no consolation that with the first winds of march the lanes were filled with violets the fruit trees covered with blossoms that the corn sprung up and the leaves came out forced by the unseasonable heat </s>
<s> we feared the balmy air we feared the cloudless sky the flower covered earth and delightful woods for we looked on the fabric of the universe no longer as our dwelling but our tomb and the fragrant land smelled to the apprehension of fear like wide church yard </s>
<s> pisando la tierra dura de continuo el hombre esta cada passo que da es sobre su sepultura yet notwithstanding these disadvantages winter was breathing time and we exerted ourselves to make the best of it </s>
<s> plague might not revive with the summer but if it did it should find us prepared </s>
<s> it is part of man's nature to adapt itself through habit even to pain and sorrow </s>
<s> pestilence had become part of our future our existence it was to be guarded against like the flooding of rivers the encroachments of ocean or the inclemency of the sky </s>
<s> after long suffering and bitter experience some panacea might be discovered as it was all that received infection died all however were not infected and it became our part to fix deep the foundations and raise high the barrier between contagion and the sane to introduce such order as would conduce to the well being of the survivors and as would preserve hope and some portion of happiness to those who were spectators of the still renewed tragedy </s>
<s> adrian had introduced systematic modes of proceeding in the metropolis which while they were unable to stop the progress of death yet prevented other evils vice and folly from rendering the awful fate of the hour still more tremendous </s>
<s> wished to imitate his example but men are used to move all together if they move at all and could find no means of leading the inhabitants of scattered towns and villages who forgot my words as soon as they heard them not and veered with every baffling wind that might arise from an apparent change of circumstance </s>
<s> adopted another plan </s>
<s> those writers who have imagined reign of peace and happiness on earth have generally described rural country where each small township was directed by the elders and wise men </s>
<s> this was the key of my design </s>
<s> each village however small usually contains leader one among themselves whom they venerate whose advice they seek in difficulty and whose good opinion they chiefly value </s>
<s> was immediately drawn to make this observation by occurrences that presented themselves to my personal experience </s>
<s> in the village of little marlow an old woman ruled the community </s>
<s> she had lived for some years in an alms house and on fine sundays her threshold was constantly beset by crowd seeking her advice and listening to her admonitions </s>
<s> she had been soldier's wife and had seen the world infirmity induced by fevers caught in unwholesome quarters had come on her before its time and she seldom moved from her little cot </s>
<s> the plague entered the village and while fright and grief deprived the inhabitants of the little wisdom they possessed old martha stepped forward and said before now have been in town where there was the plague and you escaped no but recovered after this martha was seated more firmly than ever on the regal seat elevated by reverence and love </s>
<s> she entered the cottages of the sick she relieved their wants with her own hand she betrayed no fear and inspired all who saw her with some portion of her own native courage </s>
<s> she attended the markets she insisted upon being supplied with food for those who were too poor to purchase it </s>
<s> she shewed them how the well being of each included the prosperity of all </s>
<s> she would not permit the gardens to be neglected nor the very flowers in the cottage lattices to droop from want of care </s>
<s> hope she said was better than doctor's prescription and every thing that could sustain and enliven the spirits of more worth than drugs and mixtures </s>
<s> it was the sight of little marlow and my conversations with martha that led me to the plan formed </s>
<s> had before visited the manor houses and gentlemen's seats and often found the inhabitants actuated by the purest benevolence ready to lend their utmost aid for the welfare of their tenants </s>
<s> but this was not enough </s>
<s> the intimate sympathy generated by similar hopes and fears similar experience and pursuits was wanting here </s>
<s> the poor perceived that the rich possessed other means of preservation than those which could be partaken of by themselves seclusion and as far as circumstances permitted freedom from care </s>
<s> they could not place reliance on them but turned with tenfold dependence to the succour and advice of their equals </s>
<s> resolved therefore to go from village to village seeking out the rustic archon of the place and by systematizing their exertions and enlightening their views encrease both their power and their use among their fellow cottagers </s>
<s> many changes also now occurred in these spontaneous regal elections depositions and abdications were frequent while in the place of the old and prudent the ardent youth would step forward eager for action regardless of danger </s>
<s> often too the voice to which all listened was suddenly silenced the helping hand cold the sympathetic eye closed and the villagers feared still more the death that had selected choice victim shivering in dust the heart that had beat for them reducing to incommunicable annihilation the mind for ever occupied with projects for their welfare </s>
<s> whoever labours for man must often find ingratitude watered by vice and folly spring from the grain which he has sown </s>
<s> death which had in our younger days walked the earth like thief that comes in the night now rising from his subterranean vault girt with power with dark banner floating came conqueror </s>
<s> many saw seated above his vice regal throne supreme providence who directed his shafts and guided his progress and they bowed their heads in resignation or at least in obedience </s>
<s> others perceived only passing casualty they endeavoured to exchange terror for heedlessness and plunged into licentiousness to avoid the agonizing throes of worst apprehension </s>
<s> thus while the wise the good and the prudent were occupied by the labours of benevolence the truce of winter produced other effects among the young the thoughtless and the vicious </s>
<s> during the colder months there was general rush to london in search of amusement the ties of public opinion were loosened many were rich heretofore poor many had lost father and mother the guardians of their morals their mentors and restraints </s>
<s> it would have been useless to have opposed these impulses by barriers which would only have driven those actuated by them to more pernicious indulgencies </s>
<s> the theatres were open and thronged dance and midnight festival were frequented in many of these decorum was violated and the evils which hitherto adhered to an advanced state of civilization were doubled </s>
<s> the student left his books the artist his study the occupations of life were gone but the amusements remained enjoyment might be protracted to the verge of the grave </s>
<s> all factitious colouring disappeared death rose like night and protected by its murky shadows the blush of modesty the reserve of pride the decorum of prudery were frequently thrown aside as useless veils </s>
<s> this was not universal </s>
<s> among better natures anguish and dread the fear of eternal separation and the awful wonder produced by unprecedented calamity drew closer the ties of kindred and friendship </s>
<s> philosophers opposed their principles as barriers to the inundation of profligacy or despair and the only ramparts to protect the invaded territory of human life the religious hoping now for their reward clung fast to their creeds as the rafts and planks which over the tempest vexed sea of suffering would bear them in safety to the harbour of the unknown continent </s>
<s> the loving heart obliged to contract its view bestowed its overflow of affection in triple portion on the few that remained </s>
<s> yet even among these the present as an unalienable possession became all of time to which they dared commit the precious freight of their hopes </s>
<s> the experience of immemorial time had taught us formerly to count our enjoyments by years and extend our prospect of life through lengthened period of progression and decay the long road threaded vast labyrinth and the valley of the shadow of death in which it terminated was hid by intervening objects </s>
<s> but an earthquake had changed the scene under our very feet the earth yawned deep and precipitous the gulph below opened to receive us while the hours charioted us towards the chasm </s>
<s> but it was winter now and months must elapse before we are hurled from our security </s>
<s> we became ephemera to whom the interval between the rising and setting sun was as long drawn year of common time </s>
<s> we should never see our children ripen into maturity nor behold their downy cheeks roughen their blithe hearts subdued by passion or care but we had them now they lived and we lived what more could we desire </s>
<s> with such schooling did my poor idris try to hush thronging fears and in some measure succeeded </s>
<s> it was not as in summer time when each hour might bring the dreaded fate until summer we felt sure and this certainty short lived as it must be yet for awhile satisfied her maternal tenderness </s>
<s> know not how to express or communicate the sense of concentrated intense though evanescent transport that imparadized us in the present hour </s>
<s> our joys were dearer because we saw their end they were keener because we felt to its fullest extent their value they were purer because their essence was sympathy as meteor is brighter than star did the felicity of this winter contain in itself the extracted delights of long long life </s>
<s> how lovely is spring </s>
<s> as we looked from windsor terrace on the sixteen fertile counties spread beneath speckled by happy cottages and wealthier towns all looked as in former years heart cheering and fair </s>
<s> the land was ploughed the slender blades of wheat broke through the dark soil the fruit trees were covered with buds the husbandman was abroad in the fields the milk maid tripped home with well filled pails the swallows and martins struck the sunny pools with their long pointed wings the new dropped lambs reposed on the young grass the tender growth of leaves lifts its sweet head into the air and feeds silent space with ever sprouting green man himself seemed to regenerate and feel the frost of winter yield to an elastic and warm renewal of life reason told us that care and sorrow would grow with the opening year but how to believe the ominous voice breathed up with pestiferous vapours from fear's dim cavern while nature laughing and scattering from her green lap flowers and fruits and sparkling waters invited us to join the gay masque of young life she led upon the scene </s>
<s> where was the plague </s>
<s> here every where one voice of horror and dismay exclaimed when in the pleasant days of sunny may the destroyer of man brooded again over the earth forcing the spirit to leave its organic chrysalis and to enter upon an untried life </s>
<s> with one mighty sweep of its potent weapon all caution all care all prudence were levelled low death sat at the tables of the great stretched itself on the cottager's pallet seized the dastard who fled quelled the brave man who resisted despondency entered every heart sorrow dimmed every eye </s>
<s> sights of woe now became familiar to me and were to tell all of anguish and pain that witnessed of the despairing moans of age and the more terrible smiles of infancy in the bosom of horror my reader his limbs quivering and his hair on end would wonder how did not seized with sudden frenzy dash myself from some precipice and so close my eyes for ever on the sad end of the world </s>

<s> each day was eagerly counted and the inhabitants of towns desirous to leap this dangerous interval plunged into dissipation and strove by riot and what they wished to imagine to be pleasure to banish thought and opiate despair </s>
<s> none but adrian could have tamed the motley population of london which like troop of unbitted steeds rushing to their pastures had thrown aside all minor fears through the operation of the fear paramount </s>

<s> tragedies deep and dire were the chief favourites </s>

<s> it was not in my nature to derive consolation from such scenes from theatres whose buffoon laughter and discordant mirth awakened distempered sympathy or where fictitious tears and wailings mocked the heart felt grief within from festival or crowded meeting where hilarity sprung from the worst feelings of our nature or such enthralment of the better ones as impressed it with garish and false varnish from assemblies of mourners in the guise of revellers </s>

<s> he was not at the palace and though the attendants did not know whither he had gone they did not expect him till late at night </s>

<s> the play was macbeth the first actor of the age was there to exert his powers to drug with irreflection the auditors such medicine yearned for so entered </s>
<s> the theatre was tolerably well filled </s>
<s> shakspeare whose popularity was established by the approval of four centuries had not lost his influence even at this dread period but was still ut magus the wizard to rule our hearts and govern our imaginations </s>
<s> came in during the interval between the third and fourth act </s>
<s> looked round on the audience the females were mostly of the lower classes but the men were of all ranks come hither to forget awhile the protracted scenes of wretchedness which awaited them at their miserable homes </s>
<s> the curtain drew up and the stage presented the scene of the witches cave </s>
<s> the wildness and supernatural machinery of macbeth was pledge that it could contain little directly connected with our present circumstances </s>
<s> great pains had been taken in the scenery to give the semblance of reality to the impossible </s>
<s> the extreme darkness of the stage whose only light was received from the fire under the cauldron joined to kind of mist that floated about it rendered the unearthly shapes of the witches obscure and shadowy </s>
<s> it was not three decrepid old hags that bent over their pot throwing in the grim ingredients of the magic charm but forms frightful unreal and fanciful </s>
<s> the entrance of hecate and the wild music that followed took us out of this world </s>

<s> the entrance of macbeth did not destroy the illusion for he was actuated by the same feelings that inspired us and while the work of magic proceeded we sympathized in his wonder and his daring and gave ourselves up with our whole souls to the influence of scenic delusion </s>

<s> by slow degrees however we were drawn to the real interest of the scene </s>

<s> it cannot be called our mother but our grave where nothing but who knows nothing is once seen to smile where sighs and groans and shrieks that rent the air are made not marked where violent sorrow seems modern extasy the dead man's knell is there scarce asked for who and good men's lives expire before the flowers in their caps dying or ere they sicken </s>
<s> each word struck the sense as our life's passing bell we feared to look at each other but bent our gaze on the stage as if our eyes could fall innocuous on that alone </s>
<s> the person who played the part of rosse suddenly became aware of the dangerous ground he trod </s>
<s> he was an inferior actor but truth now made him excellent as he went on to announce to macduff the slaughter of his family he was afraid to speak trembling from apprehension of burst of grief from the audience not from his fellow mime </s>
<s> each word was drawn out with difficulty real anguish painted his features his eyes were now lifted in sudden horror now fixed in dread upon the ground </s>

<s> pang of tameless grief wrenched every heart burst of despair was echoed from every lip had entered into the universal feeling had been absorbed by the terrors of rosse re echoed the cry of macduff and then rushed out as from an hell of torture to find calm in the free air and silent street </s>
<s> free the air was not or the street silent </s>
<s> oh how longed then for the dear soothings of maternal nature as my wounded heart was still further stung by the roar of heartless merriment from the public house by the sight of the drunkard reeling home having lost the memory of what he would find there in oblivious debauch and by the more appalling salutations of those melancholy beings to whom the name of home was mockery </s>
<s> ran on at my utmost speed until found myself knew not how close to westminster abbey and was attracted by the deep and swelling tone of the organ </s>
<s> entered with soothing awe the lighted chancel and listened to the solemn religious chaunt which spoke peace and hope to the unhappy </s>
<s> the notes freighted with man's dearest prayers re echoed through the dim aisles and the bleeding of the soul's wounds was staunched by heavenly balm </s>
<s> in spite of the misery deprecated and could not understand in spite of the cold hearths of wide london and the corpse strewn fields of my native land in spite of all the variety of agonizing emotions had that evening experienced thought that in reply to our melodious adjurations the creator looked down in compassion and promise of relief the awful peal of the heaven winged music seemed fitting voice wherewith to commune with the supreme calm was produced by its sound and by the sight of many other human creatures offering up prayers and submission with me </s>
<s> sentiment approaching happiness followed the total resignation of one's being to the guardianship of the world's ruler </s>
<s> alas </s>
<s> with the failing of this solemn strain the elevated spirit sank again to earth </s>
<s> suddenly one of the choristers died he was lifted from his desk the vaults below were hastily opened he was consigned with few muttered prayers to the darksome cavern abode of thousands who had gone before now wide yawning to receive even all who fulfilled the funeral rites </s>
<s> in vain would then have turned from this scene to darkened aisle or lofty dome echoing with melodious praise </s>
<s> in the open air alone found relief among nature's beauteous works her god reassumed his attribute of benevolence and again could trust that he who built up the mountains planted the forests and poured out the rivers would erect another state for lost humanity where we might awaken again to our affections our happiness and our faith </s>
<s> fortunately for me those circumstances were of rare occurrence that obliged me to visit london and my duties were confined to the rural district which our lofty castle overlooked and here labour stood in the place of pastime to occupy such of the country people as were sufficiently exempt from sorrow or disease </s>
<s> my endeavours were directed towards urging them to their usual attention to their crops and to the acting as if pestilence did not exist </s>
<s> the mower's scythe was at times heard yet the joyless haymakers after they had listlessly turned the grass forgot to cart it the shepherd when he had sheared his sheep would let the wool lie to be scattered by the winds deeming it useless to provide clothing for another winter </s>
<s> at times however the spirit of life was awakened by these employments the sun the refreshing breeze the sweet smell of the hay the rustling leaves and prattling rivulets brought repose to the agitated bosom and bestowed feeling akin to happiness on the apprehensive </s>
<s> nor strange to say was the time without its pleasures </s>
<s> young couples who had loved long and hopelessly suddenly found every impediment removed and wealth pour in from the death of relatives </s>
<s> the very danger drew them closer </s>
<s> the immediate peril urged them to seize the immediate opportunity wildly and passionately they sought to know what delights existence afforded before they yielded to death and snatching their pleasures with rough strife thorough the iron gates of life they defied the conquering pestilence to destroy what had been or to erase even from their death bed thoughts the sentiment of happiness which had been theirs </s>
<s> one instance of this kind came immediately under our notice where high born girl had in early youth given her heart to one of meaner extraction </s>
<s> he was schoolfellow and friend of her brother's and usually spent part of the holidays at the mansion of the duke her father </s>
<s> they had played together as children been the confidants of each other's little secrets mutual aids and consolers in difficulty and sorrow </s>
<s> love had crept in noiseless terrorless at first till each felt their life bound up in the other and at the same time knew that they must part </s>
<s> their extreme youth and the purity of their attachment made them yield with less resistance to the tyranny of circumstances </s>
<s> the father of the fair juliet separated them but not until the young lover had promised to remain absent only till he had rendered himself worthy of her and she had vowed to preserve her virgin heart his treasure till he returned to claim and possess it </s>
<s> plague came threatening to destroy at once the aim of the ambitious and the hopes of love </s>
<s> long the duke of derided the idea that there could be danger while he pursued his plans of cautious seclusion and he so far succeeded that it was not till this second summer that the destroyer at one fell stroke overthrew his precautions his security and his life </s>
<s> poor juliet saw one by one father mother brothers and sisters sicken and die </s>
<s> most of the servants fled on the first appearance of disease those who remained were infected mortally no neighbour or rustic ventured within the verge of contagion </s>
<s> by strange fatality juliet alone escaped and she to the last waited on her relatives and smoothed the pillow of death </s>
<s> the moment at length came when the last blow was given to the last of the house the youthful survivor of her race sat alone among the dead </s>
<s> there was no living being near to soothe her or withdraw her from this hideous company </s>
<s> with the declining heat of september night whirlwind of storm thunder and hail rattled round the house and with ghastly harmony sung the dirge of her family </s>
<s> she sat upon the ground absorbed in wordless despair when through the gusty wind and bickering rain she thought she heard her name called </s>
<s> whose could that familiar voice be </s>
<s> not one of her relations for they lay glaring on her with stony eyes </s>
<s> again her name was syllabled and she shuddered as she asked herself am becoming mad or am dying that hear the voices of the departed </s>
<s> second thought passed swift as an arrow into her brain she rushed to the window and flash of lightning shewed to her the expected vision her lover in the shrubbery beneath joy lent her strength to descend the stairs to open the door and then she fainted in his supporting arms </s>
<s> thousand times she reproached herself as with crime that she should revive to happiness with him </s>
<s> the natural clinging of the human mind to life and joy was in its full energy in her young heart she gave herself impetuously up to the enchantment they were married and in their radiant features saw incarnate for the last time the spirit of love of rapturous sympathy which once had been the life of the world </s>
<s> envied them but felt how impossible it was to imbibe the same feeling now that years had multiplied my ties in the world </s>
<s> above all the anxious mother my own beloved and drooping idris claimed my earnest care could not reproach the anxiety that never for moment slept in her heart but exerted myself to distract her attention from too keen an observation of the truth of things of the near and nearer approaches of disease misery and death of the wild look of our attendants as intelligence of another and yet another death reached us for to the last something new occurred that seemed to transcend in horror all that had gone before </s>
<s> wretched beings crawled to die under our succouring roof the inhabitants of the castle decreased daily while the survivors huddled together in fear and as in famine struck boat the sport of the wild interminable waves each looked in the other's face to guess on whom the death lot would next fall </s>
<s> all this endeavoured to veil so that it might least impress my idris yet as have said my courage survived even despair might be vanquished but would not yield </s>
<s> one day it was the ninth of september seemed devoted to every disaster to every harrowing incident </s>
<s> early in the day heard of the arrival of the aged grandmother of one of our servants at the castle </s>
<s> this old woman had reached her hundredth year her skin was shrivelled her form was bent and lost in extreme decrepitude but as still from year to year she continued in existence out living many younger and stronger she began to feel as if she were to live for ever </s>
<s> the plague came and the inhabitants of her village died </s>
<s> clinging with the dastard feeling of the aged to the remnant of her spent life she had on hearing that the pestilence had come into her neighbourhood barred her door and closed her casement refusing to communicate with any </s>
<s> she would wander out at night to get food and returned home pleased that she had met no one that she was in no danger from the plague </s>
<s> as the earth became more desolate her difficulty in acquiring sustenance increased at first her son who lived near had humoured her by placing articles of food in her way at last he died </s>
<s> but even though threatened by famine her fear of the plague was paramount and her greatest care was to avoid her fellow creatures </s>
<s> she grew weaker each day and each day she had further to go </s>
<s> the night before she had reached datchet and prowling about had found baker's shop open and deserted </s>
<s> laden with spoil she hastened to return and lost her way </s>
<s> the night was windless hot and cloudy her load became too heavy for her and one by one she threw away her loaves still endeavouring to get along though her hobbling fell into lameness and her weakness at last into inability to move </s>
<s> she lay down among the tall corn and fell asleep </s>
<s> deep in midnight she was awaked by rustling near her she would have started up but her stiff joints refused to obey her will </s>
<s> low moan close to her ear followed and the rustling increased she heard smothered voice breathe out water water </s>
<s> several times and then again sigh heaved from the heart of the sufferer </s>
<s> the old woman shuddered she contrived at length to sit upright but her teeth chattered and her knees knocked together close very close lay half naked figure just discernible in the gloom and the cry for water and the stifled moan were again uttered </s>
<s> her motions at length attracted the attention of her unknown companion her hand was seized with convulsive violence that made the grasp feel like iron the fingers like the keen teeth of trap at last you are come were the words given forth but this exertion was the last effort of the dying the joints relaxed the figure fell prostrate one low moan the last marked the moment of death </s>
<s> morning broke and the old woman saw the corpse marked with the fatal disease close to her her wrist was livid with the hold loosened by death </s>
<s> she felt struck by the plague her aged frame was unable to bear her away with sufficient speed and now believing herself infected she no longer dreaded the association of others but as swiftly as she might came to her grand daughter at windsor castle there to lament and die </s>
<s> the sight was horrible still she clung to life and lamented her mischance with cries and hideous groans while the swift advance of the disease shewed what proved to be the fact that she could not survive many hours </s>
<s> while was directing that the necessary care should be taken of her clara came in she was trembling and pale and when anxiously asked her the cause of her agitation she threw herself into my arms weeping and exclaiming uncle dearest uncle do not hate me for ever </s>
<s> must tell you for you must know that evelyn poor little evelyn her voice was choked by sobs </s>
<s> the fear of so mighty calamity as the loss of our adored infant made the current of my blood pause with chilly horror but the remembrance of the mother restored my presence of mind </s>
<s> sought the little bed of my darling he was oppressed by fever but trusted fondly and fearfully trusted that there were no symptoms of the plague </s>
<s> he was not three years old and his illness appeared only one of those attacks incident to infancy </s>
<s> watched him long his heavy half closed lids his burning cheeks and restless twining of his small fingers the fever was violent the torpor complete enough without the greater fear of pestilence to awaken alarm </s>
<s> idris must not see him in this state </s>
<s> clara though only twelve years old was rendered through extreme sensibility so prudent and careful that felt secure in entrusting the charge of him to her and it was my task to prevent idris from observing their absence </s>
<s> administered the fitting remedies and left my sweet niece to watch beside him and bring me notice of any change she should observe </s>
<s> then went to idris contriving in my way plausible excuses for remaining all day in the castle and endeavouring to disperse the traces of care from my brow </s>
<s> fortunately she was not alone </s>
<s> found merrival the astronomer with her </s>
<s> he was far too long sighted in his view of humanity to heed the casualties of the day and lived in the midst of contagion unconscious of its existence </s>
<s> this poor man learned as la place guileless and unforeseeing as child had often been on the point of starvation he his pale wife and numerous offspring while he neither felt hunger nor observed distress </s>
<s> his astronomical theories absorbed him calculations were scrawled with coal on the bare walls of his garret hard earned guinea or an article of dress was exchanged for book without remorse he neither heard his children cry nor observed his companion's emaciated form and the excess of calamity was merely to him as the occurrence of cloudy night when he would have given his right hand to observe celestial phenomenon </s>
<s> his wife was one of those wondrous beings to be found only among women with affections not to be diminished by misfortune </s>
<s> her mind was divided between boundless admiration for her husband and tender anxiety for her children she waited on him worked for them and never complained though care rendered her life one long drawn melancholy dream </s>
<s> he had introduced himself to adrian by request he made to observe some planetary motions from his glass </s>
<s> his poverty was easily detected and relieved </s>
<s> he often thanked us for the books we lent him and for the use of our instruments but never spoke of his altered abode or change of circumstances </s>
<s> his wife assured us that he had not observed any difference except in the absence of the children from his study and to her infinite surprise he complained of this unaccustomed quiet </s>
<s> he came now to announce to us the completion of his essay on the pericyclical motions of the earth's axis and the precession of the equinoctial points </s>
<s> if an old roman of the period of the republic had returned to life and talked of the impending election of some laurel crowned consul or of the last battle with mithridates his ideas would not have been more alien to the times than the conversation of merrival </s>
<s> man no longer with an appetite for sympathy clothed his thoughts in visible signs nor were there any readers left while each one having thrown away his sword with opposing shield alone awaited the plague merrival talked of the state of mankind six thousand years hence </s>
<s> he might with equal interest to us have added commentary to describe the unknown and unimaginable lineaments of the creatures who would then occupy the vacated dwelling of mankind </s>
<s> we had not the heart to undeceive the poor old man and at the moment came in he was reading parts of his book to idris asking what answer could be given to this or that position </s>
<s> idris could not refrain from smile as she listened she had already gathered from him that his family was alive and in health though not apt to forget the precipice of time on which she stood yet could perceive that she was amused for moment by the contrast between the contracted view we had so long taken of human life and the seven league strides with which merrival paced coming eternity </s>
<s> was glad to see her smile because it assured me of her total ignorance of her infant's danger but shuddered to think of the revulsion that would be occasioned by discovery of the truth </s>

<s> mirror betrayed the sign to idris she started up </s>
<s> to suspect evil to perceive that alfred being with us the danger must regard her youngest darling to fly across the long chambers into his apartment was the work but of moment </s>
<s> there she beheld her evelyn lying fever stricken and motionless </s>
<s> followed her and strove to inspire more hope than could myself entertain but she shook her head mournfully </s>
<s> anguish deprived her of presence of mind she gave up to me and clara the physician's and nurse's parts she sat by the bed holding one little burning hand and with glazed eyes fixed on her babe passed the long day in one unvaried agony </s>
<s> it was not the plague that visited our little boy so roughly but she could not listen to my assurances apprehension deprived her of judgment and reflection every slight convulsion of her child's features shook her frame if he moved she dreaded the instant crisis if he remained still she saw death in his torpor and the cloud on her brow darkened </s>
<s> the poor little thing's fever encreased towards night </s>
<s> the sensation is most dreary to use no stronger term with which one looks forward to passing the long hours of night beside sick bed especially if the patient be an infant who cannot explain its pain and whose flickering life resembles the wasting flame of the watch light whose narrow fire is shaken by the wind and on whose edge devouring darkness hovers with eagerness one turns toward the east with angry impatience one marks the unchequered darkness the crowing of cock that sound of glee during day time comes wailing and untuneable the creaking of rafters and slight stir of invisible insect is heard and felt as the signal and type of desolation </s>
<s> clara overcome by weariness had seated herself at the foot of her cousin's bed and in spite of her efforts slumber weighed down her lids twice or thrice she shook it off but at length she was conquered and slept </s>
<s> idris sat at the bedside holding evelyn's hand we were afraid to speak to each other watched the stars hung over my child felt his little pulse drew near the mother again receded </s>
<s> at the turn of morning gentle sigh from the patient attracted me the burning spot on his cheek faded his pulse beat softly and regularly torpor yielded to sleep </s>
<s> for long time dared not hope but when his unobstructed breathing and the moisture that suffused his forehead were tokens no longer to be mistaken of the departure of mortal malady ventured to whisper the news of the change to idris and at length succeeded in persuading her that spoke truth </s>
<s> but neither this assurance nor the speedy convalescence of our child could restore her even to the portion of peace she before enjoyed </s>
<s> her fear had been too deep too absorbing too entire to be changed to security </s>
<s> she felt as if during her past calm she had dreamed but was now awake she was as one in some lone watch tower on the deep awakened from soothing visions of the home he loves trembling to hear the wrathful billows roar as one who has been cradled by storm and awakes to find the vessel sinking </s>
<s> before she had been visited by pangs of fear now she never enjoyed an interval of hope </s>
<s> no smile of the heart ever irradiated her fair countenance sometimes she forced one and then gushing tears would flow and the sea of grief close above these wrecks of past happiness </s>
<s> still while was near her she could not be in utter despair she fully confided herself to me she did not seem to fear my death or revert to its possibility to my guardianship she consigned the full freight of her anxieties reposing on my love as wind nipped fawn by the side of doe as wounded nestling under its mother's wing as tiny shattered boat quivering still beneath some protecting willow tree </s>
<s> while not proudly as in days of joy yet tenderly and with glad consciousness of the comfort afforded drew my trembling girl close to my heart and tried to ward every painful thought or rough circumstance from her sensitive nature </s>
<s> one other incident occurred at the end of this summer </s>
<s> the countess of windsor ex queen of england returned from germany </s>
<s> she had at the beginning of the season quitted the vacant city of vienna and unable to tame her haughty mind to anything like submission she had delayed at hamburgh and when at last she came to london many weeks elapsed before she gave adrian notice of her arrival </s>
<s> in spite of her coldness and long absence he welcomed her with sensibility displaying such affection as sought to heal the wounds of pride and sorrow and was repulsed only by her total apparent want of sympathy </s>
<s> idris heard of her mother's return with pleasure </s>
<s> her own maternal feelings were so ardent that she imagined her parent must now in this waste world have lost pride and harshness and would receive with delight her filial attentions </s>
<s> the first check to her duteous demonstrations was formal intimation from the fallen majesty of england that was in no manner to be intruded upon her </s>
<s> she consented she said to forgive her daughter and acknowledge her grandchildren larger concessions must not be expected </s>
<s> to me this proceeding appeared if so light term may be permitted extremely whimsical </s>
<s> now that the race of man had lost in fact all distinction of rank this pride was doubly fatuitous now that we felt kindred fraternal nature with all who bore the stamp of humanity this angry reminiscence of times for ever gone was worse than foolish </s>
<s> idris was too much taken up by her own dreadful fears to be angry hardly grieved for she judged that insensibility must be the source of this continued rancour </s>
<s> this was not altogether the fact but predominant self will assumed the arms and masque of callous feeling and the haughty lady disdained to exhibit any token of the struggle she endured while the slave of pride she fancied that she sacrificed her happiness to immutable principle </s>
<s> false was all this false all but the affections of our nature and the links of sympathy with pleasure or pain </s>
<s> there was but one good and one evil in the world life and death </s>
<s> the pomp of rank the assumption of power the possessions of wealth vanished like morning mist </s>
<s> one living beggar had become of more worth than national peerage of dead lords alas the day than of dead heroes patriots or men of genius </s>
<s> there was much of degradation in this for even vice and virtue had lost their attributes life life the continuation of our animal mechanism was the alpha and omega of the desires the prayers the prostrate ambition of human race </s>

<s> chapter ix </s>
<s> half england was desolate when october came and the equinoctial winds swept over the earth chilling the ardours of the unhealthy season </s>
<s> the summer which was uncommonly hot had been protracted into the beginning of this month when on the eighteenth sudden change was brought about from summer temperature to winter frost </s>
<s> pestilence then made pause in her death dealing career </s>
<s> gasping not daring to name our hopes yet full even to the brim with intense expectation we stood as ship wrecked sailor stands on barren rock islanded by the ocean watching distant vessel fancying that now it nears and then again that it is bearing from sight </s>
<s> this promise of renewed lease of life turned rugged natures to melting tenderness and by contrast filled the soft with harsh and unnatural sentiments </s>
<s> when it seemed destined that all were to die we were reckless of the how and when now that the virulence of the disease was mitigated and it appeared willing to spare some each was eager to be among the elect and clung to life with dastard tenacity </s>
<s> instances of desertion became more frequent and even murders which made the hearer sick with horror where the fear of contagion had armed those nearest in blood against each other </s>
<s> but these smaller and separate tragedies were about to yield to mightier interest and while we were promised calm from infectious influences tempest arose wilder than the winds tempest bred by the passions of man nourished by his most violent impulses unexampled and dire </s>
<s> number of people from north america the relics of that populous continent had set sail for the east with mad desire of change leaving their native plains for lands not less afflicted than their own </s>
<s> several hundreds landed in ireland about the first of november and took possession of such vacant habitations as they could find seizing upon the superabundant food and the stray cattle </s>
<s> as they exhausted the produce of one spot they went on to another </s>
<s> at length they began to interfere with the inhabitants and strong in their concentrated numbers ejected the natives from their dwellings and robbed them of their winter store </s>
<s> few events of this kind roused the fiery nature of the irish and they attacked the invaders </s>
<s> some were destroyed the major part escaped by quick and well ordered movements and danger made them careful </s>
<s> their numbers ably arranged the very deaths among them concealed moving on in good order and apparently given up to enjoyment they excited the envy of the irish </s>
<s> the americans permitted few to join their band and presently the recruits outnumbered the strangers nor did they join with them nor imitate the admirable order which preserved by the trans atlantic chiefs rendered them at once secure and formidable </s>
<s> the irish followed their track in disorganized multitudes each day encreasing each day becoming more lawless </s>
<s> the americans were eager to escape from the spirit they had roused and reaching the eastern shores of the island embarked for england </s>
<s> their incursion would hardly have been felt had they come alone but the irish collected in unnatural numbers began to feel the inroads of famine and they followed in the wake of the americans for england also </s>
<s> the crossing of the sea could not arrest their progress </s>
<s> the harbours of the desolate sea ports of the west of ireland were filled with vessels of all sizes from the man of war to the small fishers boat which lay sailorless and rotting on the lazy deep </s>
<s> the emigrants embarked by hundreds and unfurling their sails with rude hands made strange havoc of buoy and cordage </s>
<s> those who modestly betook themselves to the smaller craft for the most part achieved their watery journey in safety </s>
<s> some in the true spirit of reckless enterprise went on board ship of an hundred and twenty guns the vast hull drifted with the tide out of the bay and after many hours its crew of landsmen contrived to spread great part of her enormous canvass the wind took it and while thousand mistakes of the helmsman made her present her head now to one point and now to another the vast fields of canvass that formed her sails flapped with sound like that of huge cataract or such as sea like forest may give forth when buffeted by an equinoctial north wind </s>
<s> the port holes were open and with every sea which as she lurched washed her decks they received whole tons of water </s>
<s> the difficulties were increased by fresh breeze which began to blow whistling among the shrowds dashing the sails this way and that and rending them with horrid split and such whir as may have visited the dreams of milton when he imagined the winnowing of the arch fiend's van like wings which encreased the uproar of wild chaos </s>
<s> these sounds were mingled with the roaring of the sea the splash of the chafed billows round the vessel's sides and the gurgling up of the water in the hold </s>
<s> the crew many of whom had never seen the sea before felt indeed as if heaven and earth came ruining together as the vessel dipped her bows in the waves or rose high upon them </s>
<s> their yells were drowned in the clamour of elements and the thunder rivings of their unwieldy habitation they discovered at last that the water gained on them and they betook themselves to their pumps they might as well have laboured to empty the ocean by bucketfuls </s>
<s> as the sun went down the gale encreased the ship seemed to feel her danger she was now completely water logged and presented other indications of settling before she went down </s>
<s> the bay was crowded with vessels whose crews for the most part were observing the uncouth sportings of this huge unwieldy machine they saw her gradually sink the waters now rising above her lower decks they could hardly wink before she had utterly disappeared nor could the place where the sea had closed over her be at all discerned </s>
<s> some few of her crew were saved but the greater part clinging to her cordage and masts went down with her to rise only when death loosened their hold </s>
<s> this event caused many of those who were about to sail to put foot again on firm land ready to encounter any evil rather than to rush into the yawning jaws of the pitiless ocean </s>
<s> but these were few in comparison to the numbers who actually crossed </s>
<s> many went up as high as belfast to ensure shorter passage and then journeying south through scotland they were joined by the poorer natives of that country and all poured with one consent into england </s>
<s> such incursions struck the english with affright in all those towns where there was still sufficient population to feel the change </s>
<s> there was room enough indeed in our hapless country for twice the number of invaders but their lawless spirit instigated them to violence they took delight in thrusting the possessors from their houses in seizing on some mansion of luxury where the noble dwellers secluded themselves in fear of the plague in forcing these of either sex to become their servants and purveyors till the ruin complete in one place they removed their locust visitation to another </s>
<s> when unopposed they spread their ravages wide in cases of danger they clustered and by dint of numbers overthrew their weak and despairing foes </s>
<s> they came from the east and the north and directed their course without apparent motive but unanimously towards our unhappy metropolis </s>
<s> communication had been to great degree cut off through the paralyzing effects of pestilence so that the van of our invaders had proceeded as far as manchester and derby before we received notice of their arrival </s>
<s> they swept the country like conquering army burning laying waste murdering </s>
<s> the lower and vagabond english joined with them </s>
<s> some few of the lords lieutenant who remained endeavoured to collect the militia but the ranks were vacant panic seized on all and the opposition that was made only served to increase the audacity and cruelty of the enemy </s>
<s> they talked of taking london conquering england calling to mind the long detail of injuries which had for many years been forgotten </s>
<s> such vaunts displayed their weakness rather than their strength yet still they might do extreme mischief which ending in their destruction would render them at last objects of compassion and remorse </s>

<s> in the autumn of this year the spirit of emigration crept in among the few survivors who congregating from various parts of england met in london </s>
<s> this spirit existed as breath wish far off thought until communicated to adrian who imbibed it with ardour and instantly engaged himself in plans for its execution </s>
<s> the fear of immediate death vanished with the heats of september </s>
<s> another winter was before us and we might elect our mode of passing it to the best advantage </s>
<s> perhaps in rational philosophy none could be better chosen than this scheme of migration which would draw us from the immediate scene of our woe and leading us through pleasant and picturesque countries amuse for time our despair </s>
<s> the idea once broached all were impatient to put it in execution </s>
<s> we were still at windsor our renewed hopes medicined the anguish we had suffered from the late tragedies </s>
<s> the death of many of our inmates had weaned us from the fond idea that windsor castle was spot sacred from the plague but our lease of life was renewed for some months and even idris lifted her head as lily after storm when last sunbeam tinges its silver cup </s>
<s> just at this time adrian came down to us his eager looks shewed us that he was full of some scheme </s>
<s> he hastened to take me aside and disclosed to me with rapidity his plan of emigration from england </s>
<s> to leave england for ever </s>
<s> to turn from its polluted fields and groves and placing the sea between us to quit it as sailor quits the rock on which he has been wrecked when the saving ship rides by </s>
<s> such was his plan </s>
<s> to leave the country of our fathers made holy by their graves we could not feel even as voluntary exile of old who might for pleasure or convenience forsake his native soil though thousands of miles might divide him england was still part of him as he of her </s>
<s> he heard of the passing events of the day he knew that if he returned and resumed his place in society the entrance was still open and it required but the will to surround himself at once with the associations and habits of boyhood </s>

<s> the world is vast and england though her many fields and wide spread woods seem interminable is but small part of her </s>

<s> this placid appearance of nature was hailed as good augury for the voyage and the chief immediately repaired to the harbour to examine two steamboats which were moored there </s>

<s> they ascended the cliff but the darkness permitted only the white crest of waves to be seen while the roaring wind mingled its howlings in dire accord with the wild surges </s>

<s> many cried aloud that these were no meteors but globes of burning matter which had set fire to the earth and caused the vast cauldron at our feet to bubble up with its measureless waves the day of judgment was come they averred and few moments would transport us before the awful countenance of the omnipotent judge while those less given to visionary terrors declared that two conflicting gales had occasioned the last phaenomenon </s>

<s> we were therefore to great degree ignorant of the state of things on the continent and were not without some vague hope of finding numerous companions in its wide track </s>

<s> but the peril left behind was deemed imminent by my countrymen that before them doubtful and distant and soon other feelings arose to obliterate fear or to replace it by passions that ought to have had no place among brotherhood of unhappy survivors of the expiring world </s>
<s> the more numerous division of emigrants which arrived first at paris assumed superiority of rank and power the second party asserted their independence </s>
<s> third was formed by sectarian self erected prophet who while he attributed all power and rule to god strove to get the real command of his comrades into his own hands </s>
<s> this third division consisted of fewest individuals but their purpose was more one their obedience to their leader more entire their fortitude and courage more unyielding and active </s>
<s> during the whole progress of the plague the teachers of religion were in possession of great power power of good if rightly directed or of incalculable mischief if fanaticism or intolerance guided their efforts </s>
<s> in the present instance worse feeling than either of these actuated the leader </s>

<s> after the repose of few days we held council to decide on our future movements </s>
